# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-104">Definizioni delle entità tipo di informazioni sensibili</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-105">La prevenzione della perdita di dati (DLP) nel centro conformità include numerosi tipi di informazioni riservate pronte per l'uso nei criteri DLP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready for you to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0017b-106">In questo argomento vengono elencati tutti questi tipi di informazioni riservate e illustrata la ricerca eseguita dal criterio DLP quando rileva ciascun tipo di informazioni.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-106">This topic lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0017b-107">Una tipologia di informazioni riservate viene definita da un modello identificato da un'espressione regolare o da una funzione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-107">A sensitive information type is defined by a pattern that can be identified by a regular expression or a function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0017b-108">Inoltre, è possibile utilizzare elementi probatori, ad esempio, parole chiave e checksum per identificare una tipologia di informazioni riservate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-108">In addition, corroborative evidence such as keywords and checksums can be used to identify a sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0017b-109">In questa procedura di valutazione vengono usati anche il livello di probabilità e la prossimità.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-109">Confidence level and proximity are also used in the evaluation process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-110">I tipi di informazioni riservate richiedono una delle sottoscrizioni seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-110">Sensitive information types require one of these subscriptions:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span></span>

## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-113">Numero di Routing ABA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-113">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-114">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-114">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-115">nove cifre che possono trovarsi in un modello formattato o non formattato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-115">nine digits which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-116">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-116">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-117">Formattato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-117">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-118">quattro cifre che iniziano con 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 o 8</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-118">four digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-119">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-119">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-120">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-120">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-121">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-121">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-122">una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-122">a digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-123">Non formattato: nove cifre consecutive che iniziano con 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 o 8</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-123">Unformatted: nine consecutive digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span> 

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-124">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-124">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-125">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-125">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-126">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-126">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-127">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-127">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-128">La funzione Func_aba_routing restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-128">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-129">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_ABA_Routing.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-129">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- ABA Routing Number -->
<Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-149">Numero di identità nazionale Argentina (DNI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-149">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-150">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-150">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-151">Otto cifre separate da spazi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-151">Eight digits separated by periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-152">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-152">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-153">Otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-153">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-154">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-154">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-155">un punto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-155">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-156">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-156">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-157">un punto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-157">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-158">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-158">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-159">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-159">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-160">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-160">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-161">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-161">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-162">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-162">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-163">L'espressione regolare Regex_argentina_national_id trova contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-163">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-164">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_argentina_national_id.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-164">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-176">Australia-numero di conto corrente bancario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-176">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-177">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-177">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-178">Sei-TWN cifre con o senza un numero di succursale dello stato della banca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-178">six to twn digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-179">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-179">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-180">Il numero dell'account è compreso tra sei e dieci cifre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-180">Account number is six to ten digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-181">Numero BSB australiano:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-181">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-182">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-182">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-183">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-183">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-184">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-184">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-185">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-185">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-186">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-186">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-187">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-187">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-188">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-188">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-189">L'espressione regolare Regex_australia_bank_account_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-189">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-190">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_australia_bank_account_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-190">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-191">L'espressione regolare Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-191">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-192">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-192">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-193">L'espressione regolare Regex_australia_bank_account_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-193">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-194">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_australia_bank_account_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-194">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-278">Australia-numero della patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-278">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-279">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-279">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-280">nove lettere e cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-280">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-281">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-281">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-282">nove lettere e cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-282">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-283">due cifre o lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-283">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-284">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-284">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-285">cinque cifre o lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-285">five digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-286">OPPURE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-286">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-287">da 1 a 2 lettere facoltative (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-287">one to two optional letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-288">da quattro a nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-288">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-289">OPPURE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-289">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-290">nove cifre o lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-290">nine digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-291">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-291">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-292">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-292">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-293">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-293">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-294">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-294">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-295">L'espressione regolare Regex_australia_drivers_license_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-295">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-296">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-296">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-297">Non vengono trovate parole chiava da Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-297">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-397">Numero di conto medica australiano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-397">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-398">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-398">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-399">10-11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-399">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-400">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-400">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-401">10-11 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-401">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-402">la prima cifra è compresa nell'intervallo 2-6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-402">first digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-403">la nona cifra è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-403">ninth digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-404">decima cifra è la cifra del problema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-404">tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-405">undicesima cifra (facoltativa) è il numero individuale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-405">eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-406">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-406">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-407">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-407">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-408">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-408">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-409">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-409">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-410">La funzione Func_australian_medical_account_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-410">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-411">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-411">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-412">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-412">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-424">Australia-numero di passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-424">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-425">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-425">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-426">Una lettera seguita da sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-426">A letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-427">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-427">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-428">Una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole/minuscole) seguita da sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-428">A letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-429">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-429">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-430">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-430">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-431">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-431">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-432">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-432">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-433">L'espressione regolare Regex_australia_passport_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-433">The regular expression Regex_australia_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-434">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_passport o Keyword_australia_passport_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-434">A keyword from Keyword_passport or Keyword_australia_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Passport Number -->
<Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
        </Any>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>   
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-468">Australia-numero di file fiscale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-468">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-469">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-469">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-470">otto-nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-470">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-471">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-471">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-472">otto-nove cifre in genere presentate con spazi come indicato di seguito:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-472">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-473">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-473">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-474">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-474">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-475">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-475">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-476">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-476">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-477">da due a tre cifre in cui l'ultima cifra è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-477">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-478">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-478">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-479">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-479">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-480">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-480">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-481">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-481">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-482">La funzione Func_australian_tax_file_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-482">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-483">Non vengono trovate parole chiave da Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number o da Keyword_number_exclusions.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-483">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-484">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-484">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml

    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-525">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-525">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-531">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-531">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-534">24 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-534">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="0017b-535">22 lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole), cifre, barre rovesciate, barre o segni più</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-535">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-536">due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole), cifre, barre rovesciate, barre, segni più o segni uguali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-536">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-541">L'espressione regolare  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-541">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-549">Questa entità dei tipi di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo nel tipo di sensitiveinformation del numero di passaporto dell'Unione europea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-549">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitiveinformation type.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-554">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-554">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-558">non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-558">not applicable</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-560">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-560">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-561">L'espressione regolare  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-561">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-562">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-562">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />

            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-585">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-585">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-586">10 cifre nel formato specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-586">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-587">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-587">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-588">10 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-588">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-589">tre cifre che corrispondono a un numero di serie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-589">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-590">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-590">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-591">sei cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (GGMMAA)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-591">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-592">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-592">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-593">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-593">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-594">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-594">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-595">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-595">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-596">La funzione ' Func_austria_eu_</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-596">The function  \`Func_austria_eu_</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-597">_or_equivalent ' trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-597">_or_equivalent\` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-598">viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-598">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-599">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-599">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-600">La funzione  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-600">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-616">Austria codice di identificazione fiscale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-616">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-617">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-617">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-618">nove cifre con trattino e barra di inoltro opzionali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-618">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-619">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-619">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-620">nove cifre con trattino e barra di inoltro facoltativi:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-620">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-621">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-621">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-622">un trattino (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-622">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-623">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-623">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-624">una barra (facoltativa)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-624">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-625">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-625">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-626">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-626">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-627">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-627">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-628">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-628">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-629">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-629">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-630">La funzione  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-630">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-631">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-631">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-632">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 65%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-632">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-633">La funzione  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-633">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-656">Tassa sul valore aggiunto Austria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-656">Austria value added tax</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-657">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-657">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-660">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-660">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-661">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-661">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-662">Sicurezza delle app di Microsoft Cloud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-662">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-663">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-663">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-664">motivo alfanumerico di 11 caratteri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-664">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-665">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-665">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-666">motivo alfanumerico di 11 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-666">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-667">A o a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-667">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-668">T o t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-668">T or t</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-671">spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-671">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-672">due o tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-672">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-673">spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-673">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-674">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-674">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-675">spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-675">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-676">una o due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-676">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-677">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-677">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-678">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-678">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-679">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-679">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-680">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-680">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-681">La funzione Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-681">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-682">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-682">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-683">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-683">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-684">La funzione Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-684">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-702">Chiave di autenticazione di DocumentDB di Azure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-702">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-929">Chiave dell'account di archiviazione di Azure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-929">Azure storage account key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-930">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-930">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-931">La stringa "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" seguita dai caratteri e dalle stringhe delineate nel modello seguente, inclusa la stringa "AccountKey".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-931">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "AccountKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-932">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-932">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-933">la stringa "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-933">the string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-934">zero a due caratteri dello spazio vuoto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-934">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-935">segno di uguale (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-935">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-936">zero a due caratteri dello spazio vuoto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-936">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-937">qualsiasi combinazione tra 1-200 lettere, cifre, simboli, caratteri speciali o spazi in maiuscolo o minuscolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-937">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-938">la stringa "AccountKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-938">the string "AccountKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-939">zero a due caratteri dello spazio vuoto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-939">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-940">segno di uguale (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-940">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-941">zero a due caratteri dello spazio vuoto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-941">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-942">qualsiasi combinazione di 86 caratteri che sono lettere maiuscole o minuscole, cifre, barra (/) o segno più (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-942">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-943">due segni uguali (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-943">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-944">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-945">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-945">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-946">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-946">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-947">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-947">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-948">L'espressione regolare CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey trova contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-948">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-949">L'espressione regolare CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter **non** trova il contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-949">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-950">L'espressione regolare CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **non** trova il contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-950">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-968">Chiave dell'account di archiviazione di Azure (generico)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-968">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-969">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-969">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-970">Qualsiasi combinazione di 86 lettere maiuscole e minuscole, cifre, barra (/) o segno più (+), preceduto o seguito dai caratteri delineati nel modello seguente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-970">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-971">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-971">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-972">zero a uno dei simboli maggiori di (>), apostrofo ('), segno di uguale (=), virgolette (") o segno numerico (#)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-972">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-973">qualsiasi combinazione di 86 caratteri che sono lettere maiuscole o minuscole, cifre, barra (/) o segno più (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-973">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-974">due segni uguali (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-974">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-975">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-975">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-976">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-976">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-977">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-977">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-978">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-978">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-979">L'espressione regolare CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric trova contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-979">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-980">Numero della patente di guida belga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-980">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1013">Numero nazionale belga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1013">Belgium national number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1014">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1014">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1015">11 cifre più delimitatori opzionali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1015">11 digits plus optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1016">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1016">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1017">11 cifre più delimitatori:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1017">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1018">sei cifre e due periodi facoltativi nel formato AA. MM. DD per data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1018">six digits and two optional periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1019">Delimitatore facoltativo da dot, Dash, Space</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1019">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1020">tre cifre sequenziali (dispari per i maschi, anche per le femmine)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1020">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1021">Delimitatore facoltativo da dot, Dash, Space</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1021">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1022">due cifre di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1022">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1023">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1023">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1024">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1024">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1025">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1025">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1026">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1026">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1027">La funzione Func_belgium_national_number trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1027">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1028">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_belgium_national_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1028">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1029">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1029">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1030">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 65%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1030">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1031">La funzione Func_belgium_national_number trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1031">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1032">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1032">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
       <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1091">Numero di passaporto belga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1091">Belgium passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1092">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo nel tipo di informazioni riservate del numero di passaporto dell'Unione europea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1092">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1093">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1093">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1094">due lettere seguite da sei cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1094">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1095">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1095">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1096">due lettere e seguite da sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1096">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1097">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1097">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1098">non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1098">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1099">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1099">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1100">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1100">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1101">L'espressione regolare  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1101">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1102">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1102">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1126">Codice di previdenza sociale belga o identificazione equivalente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1126">Belgium social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1127">Questa entità dei tipi di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo nel tipo di informazioni riservate del codice di previdenza sociale dell'Unione europea o ID equivalente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1127">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1128">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1128">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1129">11 cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1129">11 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1130">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1130">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1131">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1131">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1132">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1132">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1133">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1133">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1134">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1134">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1135">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1135">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1136">La funzione  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1136">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1137">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1137">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1138">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1138">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1139">La funzione  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1139">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1159">Numero di imposta sul valore aggiunto belga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1159">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1160">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1160">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1161">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1161">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1162">criteri di conformità della comunicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1162">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1163">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1163">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1164">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1164">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1165">Sicurezza delle app di Microsoft Cloud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1165">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1166">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1166">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1167">motivo alfanumerico di 12 caratteri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1167">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1168">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1168">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1169">motivo alfanumerico di 12 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1169">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1170">una lettera B o b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1170">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1171">una lettera E o e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1171">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1172">una cifra 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1172">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1173">una cifra da 1 a 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1173">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1174">un punto o un segno meno facoltativo o uno spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1174">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1175">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1175">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1176">un punto o un segno meno facoltativo o uno spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1176">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1177">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1177">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1178">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1178">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1179">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1179">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1180">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1180">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1181">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1181">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1182">La funzione Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1182">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1183">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1183">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1184">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1184">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1185">La funzione Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1185">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1197">Brasile CPF numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1197">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1198">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1198">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1199">11 cifre che includono una cifra di controllo e possono essere formattate o non formattate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1199">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1200">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1200">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1201">Formattato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1201">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1202">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1202">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1203">un punto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1203">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1204">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1204">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1205">un punto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1205">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1206">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1206">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1207">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1207">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1208">due cifre che sono cifre di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1208">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1209">Formattato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1209">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1210">11 cifre dove le ultime due sono cifre di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1210">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1211">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1211">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1212">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1212">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1213">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1213">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1214">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1214">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1215">La funzione Func_brazil_cpf trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1215">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1216">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_brazil_cpf.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1216">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1217">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1217">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1218">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1218">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1219">La funzione Func_brazil_cpf trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1219">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1220">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1220">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1232">Numero di persona giuridica brasiliana (CNPJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1232">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1233">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1233">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1234">14 cifre che includono il numero di registrazione, il codice della filiale, le cifre di controllo e i delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1234">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1235">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1235">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1236">14 cifre più delimitatori:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1236">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1237">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1237">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1238">un punto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1238">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1239">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1239">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1240">un punto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1240">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1241">tre cifre (queste prime otto cifre sono il numero di registrazione)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1241">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1242">una barra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1242">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1243">numero di diramazione a quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1243">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1244">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1244">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1245">due cifre che sono cifre di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1245">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1246">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1246">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1247">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1247">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1248">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1248">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1249">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1249">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1250">La funzione Func_brazil_cnpj trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1250">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1251">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_brazil_cnpj.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1251">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1252">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1252">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1253">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1253">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1254">La funzione Func_brazil_cnpj trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1254">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1255">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1255">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
