## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1277">Carta di identità nazionale brasiliana (RG)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1277">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1278">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1278">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1279">Registro Geral (formato precedente): nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1279">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1280">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (nuovo formato): 11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1280">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1281">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1281">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1282">Registro Geral (formato precedente):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1282">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1283">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1283">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1284">un punto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1284">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1285">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1285">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1286">un punto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1286">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1287">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1287">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1288">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1288">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1289">una cifra che corrisponde a una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1289">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1290">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (nuovo formato):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1290">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1291">dieci cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1291">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1292">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1292">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1293">una cifra che corrisponde a una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1293">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1294">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1294">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1295">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1295">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1296">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1296">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1297">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1297">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1298">La funzione Func_brazil_rg trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1298">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1299">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_brazil_rg.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1299">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1300">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1300">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1301">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1301">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1302">La funzione Func_brazil_rg trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1302">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1303">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1303">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
<Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1314">Bulgaria-numero della patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1314">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1315">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo nel tipo di informazioni riservate del conducente dell'Unione europea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1315">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1316">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1316">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1317">nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1317">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1318">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1318">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1319">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1319">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1320">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1320">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1321">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1321">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1322">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1322">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1323">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1323">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1324">L'espressione regolare  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1324">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1325">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1325">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
             <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern> 
</Entity>    
```

## <a name="bulgaria-uniform-civil-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1344">Bulgaria (Uniform Civil Number)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1344">Bulgaria uniform civil number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1345">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1345">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1346">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1346">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1347">criteri di conformità della comunicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1347">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1348">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1348">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1349">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1349">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1350">Sicurezza delle app di Microsoft Cloud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1350">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1351">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1351">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1352">dieci cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1352">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1353">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1353">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1354">dieci cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1354">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1355">sei cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (AAMMGG)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1355">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1356">due cifre che corrispondono all'ordine di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1356">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1357">una cifra che corrisponde al sesso: una cifra pari per il maschio e una cifra dispari per la femmina</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1357">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1358">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1358">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1359">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1359">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1360">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1360">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1361">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1361">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1362">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1362">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1363">La funzione  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1363">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1364">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1364">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1365">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1365">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1366">La funzione  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1366">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1411">Bulgaria-numero di passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1411">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1412">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo nel tipo di informazioni riservate del numero di passaporto dell'Unione europea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1412">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1413">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1413">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1414">nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1414">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1415">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1415">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1416">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1416">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1417">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1417">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1418">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1418">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1419">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1419">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1420">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1420">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1421">L'espressione regolare  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1421">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1422">Una parola chiave da  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` o `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` viene trovata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1422">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common`is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1439">Canada-numero di conto corrente bancario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1439">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1440">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1440">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1441">sette o dodici cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1441">seven or twelve digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1442">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1442">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1443">Un numero di conto corrente canadese comprende 7 o 12 cifre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1443">A Canada Bank Account Number is seven or twelve digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1444">Un numero di transito bancario canadese comprende:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1444">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1445">cinque cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1445">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1446">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1446">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1447">tre cifre o</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1447">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1448">zero "0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1448">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1449">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1449">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1450">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1450">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1451">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1451">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1452">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1452">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1453">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1453">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1454">L'espressione regolare Regex_canada_bank_account_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1454">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1455">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_canada_bank_account_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1455">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1456">L'espressione regolare Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1456">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1457">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1457">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1458">L'espressione regolare Regex_canada_bank_account_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1458">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1459">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_canada_bank_account_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1459">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1483">Canada-numero della patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1483">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1484">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1484">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1485">Varia in base alla provincia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1485">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1486">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1486">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1487">Vari modelli per Alberta, Columbia Britannica, Manitoba, Nuovo Brunswick, Terranova e Labrador, Nuova Scozia, Ontario, Isola del Principe Edoardo, Quebec e Saskatchewan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1487">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1488">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1488">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1489">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1489">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1490">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1490">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1491">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1491">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1492">La funzione Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1492">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1493">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1493">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1494">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_canada_drivers_license.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1494">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_british_columbia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_british_columbia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_manitoba_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
```

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1700">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1700">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1701">L'espressione regolare Regex_canada_phin restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1701">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1702">Sono state trovate almeno due parole chiave provenienti da Keyword_canada_phin o Keyword_canada_provinces.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1702">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1735">Canada-numero di previdenza sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1735">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1736">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1736">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1737">nove cifre con trattini o spazi facoltativi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1737">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1738">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1738">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1739">Formattato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1739">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1740">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1740">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1741">un trattino o uno spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1741">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1742">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1742">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1743">un trattino o uno spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1743">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1744">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1744">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1745">Non formattato: nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1745">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1746">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1746">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1747">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1747">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1748">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1748">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1749">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1749">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1750">La funzione Func_canadian_sin restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1750">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1751">Almeno due delle seguenti combinazioni:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1751">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1752">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_sin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1752">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1753">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_sin_collaborative.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1753">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1754">La funzione Func_eu_date rileva una data nel formato corretto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1754">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1755">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1755">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1756">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1756">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1757">La funzione Func_unformatted_canadian_sin restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1757">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1758">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_sin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1758">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1759">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1759">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1784">Cile-numero di carta d'identità</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1784">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1785">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1785">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1786">da sette a otto cifre più delimitatori una cifra di controllo o una lettera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1786">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1787">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1787">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1788">da sette a otto cifre più delimitatori:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1788">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1789">una o due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1789">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1790">un punto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1790">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1791">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1791">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1792">un punto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1792">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1793">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1793">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1794">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1794">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1795">una cifra o una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole/minuscole) che corrisponde a una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1795">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1796">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1796">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1797">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1797">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1798">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1798">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1799">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1799">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1800">La funzione Func_chile_id_card trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1800">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1801">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_chile_id_card.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1801">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1802">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1802">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1803">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1803">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1804">La funzione Func_chile_id_card trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1804">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1805">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1805">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1820">Numero di carta di identità residente in Cina (RPC)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1820">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1821">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1821">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1822">18 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1822">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1823">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1823">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1824">18 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1824">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1825">sei cifre che corrispondono a un codice di indirizzo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1825">six digits which are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1826">otto cifre nel formato AAAAMMGG, ovvero la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1826">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1827">tre cifre che sono un codice di ordinazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1827">three digits which are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1828">una cifra che corrisponde a una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1828">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1829">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1829">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1830">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1830">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1831">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1831">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1832">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1832">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1833">La funzione Func_china_resident_id trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1833">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1834">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_china_resident_id.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1834">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1835">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1835">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1836">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1836">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1837">La funzione Func_china_resident_id trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1837">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1838">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1838">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1851">Numero di carta di credito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1851">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1852">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1852">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1853">da 14 a 16 cifre che possono essere formattate o non formattate (dddddddddddddddd) e che devono superare il test di Luhn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1853">14 to 16 digits which can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and which must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1854">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1854">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1855">Modello molto complesso e solido che rileva carte di credito dei maggiori circuiti del mondo, ad esempio, Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, nonché carte regalo e ticket restaurant.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1855">Very complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1856">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1856">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1857">Yes, il checksum Luhn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1857">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-1858">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1858">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1859">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1859">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1860">La funzione Func_credit_card restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1860">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1861">Si verifica una delle situazioni seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1861">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1862">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_cc_verification.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1862">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1863">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_cc_name.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1863">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1864">La funzione Func_expiration_date rileva una data nel formato corretto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1864">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1865">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1865">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-1866">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 65%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1866">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1867">La funzione Func_credit_card restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1867">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-1868">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-1868">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2128">Numero della patente di guida croata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2128">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2129">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo nel tipo di informazioni riservate del conducente dell'Unione europea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2129">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2130">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2130">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2131">otto cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2131">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2132">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2132">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2133">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2133">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2134">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2134">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2135">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2135">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2136">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2136">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2137">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2137">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2138">L'espressione regolare  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2138">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2155">Croazia-numero di carta d'identità</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2155">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2156">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è inclusa nel tipo di informazioni riservate del numero di identificazione nazionale dell'Unione europea ed è disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate stand-alone.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2156">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2157">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2157">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2159">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2159">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2160">nove cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2160">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2161">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2161">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2162">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2162">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2163">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2163">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2164">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2164">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2165">La funzione Func_croatia_id_card trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2165">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2166">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_croatia_id_card.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2166">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2197">Numero del passaporto Croatia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2197">Croatia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2198">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo nel tipo di informazioni riservate del numero di passaporto dell'Unione europea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2198">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2199">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2199">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2200">nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2200">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2201">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2201">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2202">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2202">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2203">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2203">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2204">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2204">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2205">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2205">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2206">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2206">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2207">L'espressione regolare  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2207">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2208">Una parola chiave da  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` o `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` viene trovata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2208">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2226">Numero di identificazione personale (OIB) (Croazia)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2226">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2227">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2227">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2228">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2228">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2229">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2229">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2230">11 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2230">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2231">dieci cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2231">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2232">la cifra finale è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2232">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2233">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2233">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2234">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2234">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2235">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2235">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2236">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2236">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2237">La funzione Func_croatia_oib_number trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2237">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2238">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2238">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2239">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2239">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2240">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2240">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2241">La funzione Func_croatia_oib_number trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2241">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2242">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2242">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2245">majstorski broj građana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2245">majstorski broj građana</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2246">numero di cittadino Master</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2246">master citizen number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2247">Nacionalni identifikacijski broj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2247">nacionalni identifikacijski broj</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2273">Croazia codice di previdenza sociale o identificazione equivalente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2273">Croatia social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2274">Questa entità dei tipi di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo nel tipo di informazioni riservate del codice di previdenza sociale dell'Unione europea o ID equivalente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2274">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2275">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2275">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2276">11 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2276">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2277">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2277">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2278">11 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2278">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2279">dieci cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2279">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2280">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2280">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2281">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2281">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2282">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2282">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2283">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2283">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2284">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2284">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2285">La funzione  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2285">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2286">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2286">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2287">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2287">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2288">La funzione  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2288">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2305">Numero della patente di guida cipriota</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2305">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2306">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo nel tipo di informazioni riservate del conducente dell'Unione europea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2306">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2307">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2307">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2308">12 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2308">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2309">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2309">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2310">12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2310">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2311">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2311">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2312">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2312">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2313">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2313">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2314">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2314">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2315">L'espressione regolare  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2315">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2316">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2316">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2356">Numero di passaporto di Cipro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2356">Cyprus passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2358">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2358">Format</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2362">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2362">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2363">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2363">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2364">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2364">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2365">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2365">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2366">L'espressione regolare  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2366">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2367">Una parola chiave da  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` o `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` viene trovata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2367">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2393">Numero di identificazione fiscale cipriota</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2393">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2394">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2394">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2395">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2395">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2396">criteri di conformità della comunicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2396">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2397">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2397">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2398">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2398">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2399">Sicurezza delle app di Microsoft Cloud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2399">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2400">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2400">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2401">otto cifre e una lettera nel modello specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2401">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2402">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2402">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2403">otto cifre e una lettera:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2403">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2404">"0" o "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2404">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2405">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2405">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2406">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2406">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2407">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2407">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2408">non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2408">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2409">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2409">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2410">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2410">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2411">La funzione  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2411">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2412">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2412">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2413">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2413">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2414">La funzione  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2414">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2442">Numero della patente di guida ceco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2442">Czech driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2443">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo nel tipo di informazioni riservate del conducente dell'Unione europea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2443">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2444">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2444">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2445">due lettere seguite da sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2445">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2446">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2446">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2447">otto lettere e cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2447">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2448">due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2448">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2449">uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2449">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2450">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2450">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2451">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2451">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2452">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2452">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2453">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2453">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2454">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2454">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2455">L'espressione regolare  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2455">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2456">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2456">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>

```

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2473">Numero di passaporto ceco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2473">Czech passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2474">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo nel tipo di informazioni riservate del numero di passaporto dell'Unione europea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2474">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2475">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2475">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2476">otto cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2476">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2477">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2477">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2478">otto cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2478">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2479">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2479">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2480">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2480">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2481">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2481">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2482">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2482">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2483">L'espressione regolare  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2483">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2484">Una parola chiave da  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` o `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` viene trovata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2484">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
