## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2503">Numero di identità personale ceco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2503">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2504">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2504">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2505">nove cifre con barra opzionale (vecchio formato) a dieci cifre con barra di inoltro facoltativa (nuovo formato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2505">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) ten digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2506">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2506">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2507">nove cifre (formato obsoleto):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2507">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2508">sei cifre che rappresentano la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2508">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2509">barra di inoltro facoltativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2509">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2510">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2510">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2511">dieci cifre (nuovo formato):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2511">ten digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2512">sei cifre che rappresentano la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2512">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2513">barra di inoltro facoltativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2513">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2514">quattro cifre in cui l'ultima cifra è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2514">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2515">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2515">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2516">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2516">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2517">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2517">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2518">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2518">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2519">La funzione Func_czech_id_card trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2519">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2520">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_czech_id_card.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2520">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2521">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2521">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2522">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2522">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2523">La funzione Func_czech_id_card_new_format trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2523">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2524">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2524">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2571">Codice di previdenza sociale ceco o identificazione equivalente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2571">Czech social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2572">Questa entità dei tipi di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo nel tipo di informazioni riservate del codice di previdenza sociale dell'Unione europea o ID equivalente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2572">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2573">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2573">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2574">dieci cifre e una barra rovesciata nel modello specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2574">ten digits and a backslash in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2575">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2575">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2576">dieci cifre e una barra rovesciata:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2576">ten digits and a backslash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2577">sei cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (AAMMGG):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2577">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD):</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2578">una barra rovesciata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2578">a backslash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2579">tre cifre che corrispondono a un numero di serie che separa le persone nate nella stessa data</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2579">three digits that correspond to a serial number that separates persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2580">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2580">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2581">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2581">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2582">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2582">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2583">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2583">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2584">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2584">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2585">La funzione  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2585">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2586">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2586">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2587">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2587">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2588">La funzione  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2588">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2604">Danimarca-numero della patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2604">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2605">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo nel tipo di informazioni riservate del conducente dell'Unione europea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2605">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2606">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2606">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2607">otto cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2607">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2608">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2608">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2609">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2609">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2610">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2610">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2611">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2611">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2612">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2612">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2613">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2613">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2614">L'espressione regolare  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2614">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2615">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2615">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2632">Numero di passaporto Danimarca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2632">Denmark passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2633">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo nel tipo di informazioni riservate del numero di passaporto dell'Unione europea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2633">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2634">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2634">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2635">nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2635">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2636">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2636">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2637">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2637">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2638">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2638">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2639">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2639">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2640">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2640">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2641">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2641">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2642">L'espressione regolare  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2642">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2643">Una parola chiave da  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` o `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` viene trovata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2643">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2660">Danimarca-numero di identificazione personale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2660">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2661">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2661">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2662">dieci cifre contenenti un segno meno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2662">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2663">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2663">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2664">dieci cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2664">ten digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2665">sei cifre nel formato GGMMAA, ovvero la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2665">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2666">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2666">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2667">quattro cifre in cui la cifra finale è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2667">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2668">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2668">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2669">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2669">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2670">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2670">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2671">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2671">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2672">L'espressione regolare Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number trova contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2672">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2673">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_denmark_id.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2673">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2674">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2674">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2675">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 65%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2675">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2676">L'espressione regolare Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number trova contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2676">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2677">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2677">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2749">Numero di previdenza sociale danese o identificazione equivalente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2749">Denmark social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2750">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo il numero di previdenza sociale dell'Unione europea o il tipo di informazioni sensibili ID equivalente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2750">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2751">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2751">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2752">dieci cifre e un trattino nel modello specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2752">ten digits and a hyphen in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2753">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2753">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2754">dieci cifre e un trattino:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2754">ten digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2755">sei cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (GGMMAA)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2755">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2756">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2756">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2757">quattro cifre che corrispondono a un numero di sequenza</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2757">four digits that correspond to a sequence number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2758">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2758">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2759">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2759">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2760">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2760">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2761">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2761">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2762">La funzione  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2762">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2763">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2763">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2764">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2764">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2765">La funzione  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2765">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2779">Numero dell'agenzia di applicazione della droga (DEA)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2779">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2780">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2780">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2781">due lettere seguite da sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2781">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2782">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2782">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2783">Il modello deve includere tutti gli elementi seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2783">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2784">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole/minuscole) da questo set di lettere possibili: abcdefghjklmnprstux, che è un codice dichiarante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2784">one letter (not case sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2785">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole/minuscole), che è la prima lettera del cognome del dichiarante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2785">one letter (not case sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2786">sette cifre, l'ultima delle quali è la cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2786">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2787">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2787">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2788">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2788">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2789">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2789">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2790">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2790">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2791">La funzione Func_dea_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2791">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2792">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2792">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- DEA Number -->
<Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2793">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2793">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2794">nessuno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2794">none</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2795">Numero della patente di guida estone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2795">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2796">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo nel tipo di informazioni riservate del conducente dell'Unione europea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2796">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2797">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2797">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2798">due lettere seguite da sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2798">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2799">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2799">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2800">due lettere e sei cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2800">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2801">lettere "ET" (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2801">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2802">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2802">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2803">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2803">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2804">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2804">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2805">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2805">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2806">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2806">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2807">L'espressione regolare  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2807">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2808">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2808">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2824">Estonia Codice di identificazione personale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2824">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2825">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2825">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2826">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2826">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2827">criteri di conformità della comunicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2827">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2828">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2828">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2829">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2829">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2830">Sicurezza delle app di Microsoft Cloud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2830">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2831">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2831">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2832">11 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2832">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2833">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2833">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2834">11 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2834">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2835">una cifra che corrisponde al sesso e al secolo di nascita (numero dispari maschio, anche numero femmina; 1-2: XIX secolo; 3-4: XX secolo; 5-6: XXI secolo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2835">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2836">sei cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (AAMMGG)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2836">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2837">tre cifre che corrispondono a un numero di serie che separa le persone nate nella stessa data</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2837">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2838">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2838">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2839">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2839">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2840">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2840">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2841">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2841">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2842">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2842">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2843">La funzione  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2843">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2844">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2844">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2845">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2845">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2846">La funzione  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2846">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2879">Numero di passaporto Estonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2879">Estonia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2880">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo nel tipo di informazioni riservate del numero di passaporto dell'Unione europea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2880">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2881">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2881">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2882">una lettera seguita da sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2882">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2883">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2883">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2884">una lettera seguita da sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2884">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2885">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2885">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2886">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2886">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2887">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2887">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2888">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2888">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2889">L'espressione regolare  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2889">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2890">Una parola chiave da  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` o `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` viene trovata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2890">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2905">Numero di carta di debito dell'Unione europea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2905">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2906">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2906">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2907">16 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2907">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2908">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2908">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2909">Modello molto complesso e solido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2909">Very complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2910">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2910">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2911">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2911">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-2912">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2912">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-2913">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2913">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2914">La funzione Func_eu_debit_card restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2914">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2915">Si verifica almeno una delle situazioni seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2915">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2916">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_eu_debit_card.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2916">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2917">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_card_terms_dict.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2917">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2918">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_card_security_terms_dict.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2918">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2919">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2919">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2920">La funzione Func_expiration_date rileva una data nel formato corretto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2920">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-2921">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-2921">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3367">Finlandia-numero della patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3367">Finland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3368">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo nel tipo di informazioni riservate del conducente dell'Unione europea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3368">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3369">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3369">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3370">dieci cifre contenenti un segno meno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3370">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3371">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3371">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3372">dieci cifre contenenti un trattino:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3372">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3373">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3373">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3374">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3374">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3375">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3375">four digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3376">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3376">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3377">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3377">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3378">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3378">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3379">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3379">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3380">L'espressione regolare  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3380">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3381">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3381">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3397">Finlandia-numero di assicurazione sanitaria europea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3397">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3398">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3398">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3399">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3399">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3400">criteri di conformità della comunicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3400">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3401">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3401">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3402">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3402">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3403">Sicurezza delle app di Microsoft Cloud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3403">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3404">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3404">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3405">numero di 20 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3405">20 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3406">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3406">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3407">numero di 20 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3407">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3408">dieci cifre-8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3408">ten digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3409">uno spazio o un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3409">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3410">dieci cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3410">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3411">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3411">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3412">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3412">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3413">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3413">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3414">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3414">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3415">La Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number Regex trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3415">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3416">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3416">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml

      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3434">ID nazionale Finlandia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3434">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3435">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3435">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3436">sei cifre più un carattere che indica un secolo più tre cifre più una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3436">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3437">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3437">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3438">Il modello deve includere tutti gli elementi seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3438">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3439">sei cifre nel formato formato GGMMAA che sono una data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3439">six digits in the format format DDMMYY which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3440">indicatore Century ('-',' +' or ' a')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3440">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3441">numero di identificazione personale a tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3441">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3442">una cifra o una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) che corrisponde a una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3442">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3443">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3443">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3444">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3444">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3445">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3445">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3446">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3446">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3447">la funzione Func_finnish_national_id trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3447">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3448">viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_finnish_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3448">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3449">il checksum passa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3449">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3450">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3450">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3451">la funzione Func_finnish_national_id trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3451">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3452">il checksum passa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3452">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3453">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3453">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3454">ainutlaatuinen henkilökohtainen tunnus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3454">ainutlaatuinen henkilökohtainen tunnus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3455">henkilökohtainen tunnus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3455">henkilökohtainen tunnus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3456">henkilötunnus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3456">henkilötunnus</span></span>

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3501">Numero di passaporto Finlandia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3501">Finland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3502">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile nel tipo di informazioni riservate del numero di passaporto dell'Unione europea ed è disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate stand-alone.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3502">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3503">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3503">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3504">combinazione di nove lettere e cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3504">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3505">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3505">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3506">combinazione di nove lettere e cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3506">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3507">due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3507">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3508">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3508">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3509">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3509">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3510">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3510">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3511">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3511">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3512">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3512">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3513">L'espressione regolare Regex_finland_passport_number trova contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3513">The regular expression Regex_finland_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3514">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keywords_eu_passport_number_common o Keyword_finland_passport_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3514">A keyword from Keywords_eu_passport_number_common or Keyword_finland_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3535">Numero di previdenza sociale Finlandia o identificazione equivalente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3535">Finland social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3536">Questa entità dei tipi di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo nel tipo di informazioni riservate del codice di previdenza sociale dell'Unione europea o ID equivalente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3536">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3537">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3537">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3538">Una combinazione di 11 caratteri nel formato specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3538">An 11-character combination in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3539">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3539">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3540">una combinazione di 11 caratteri nel formato specificato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3540">an 11-character combination in the specified format:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3541">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3541">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3542">un'istanza di una delle opzioni seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3542">one instance of one of the following:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3543">segno più</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3543">plus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3544">segno meno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3544">minus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3545">la lettera "A" (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3545">the letter "A" (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3546">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3546">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3547">una lettera o una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3547">one letter or one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3548">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3548">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3549">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3549">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3550">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3550">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3551">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3551">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3552">La funzione  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3552">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3553">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3553">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3554">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3554">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3555">La funzione  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3555">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3579">Francia-numero della patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3579">France driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3580">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile nel tipo di informazioni riservate del conducente dell'Unione europea ed è disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate stand-alone.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3580">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3581">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3581">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3582">12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3582">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3583">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3583">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3584">12 cifre con convalida per scontare modelli analoghi, ad esempio, quello dei numeri telefonici francesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3584">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3585">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3585">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3586">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3586">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3587">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3587">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3588">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3588">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3589">la funzione Func_french_drivers_license trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3589">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3590">si verifica almeno una delle condizioni seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3590">at least one of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3591">viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_french_drivers_license.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3591">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3592">la funzione Func_eu_date trova una data nel formato di data appropriato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3592">the function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

```xml
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3690">Francia-numero di previdenza sociale (INSEE) o identificazione equivalente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3690">France social security number (INSEE) or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3691">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è inclusa nel codice di previdenza sociale dell'Unione europea e nel tipo di informazioni riservate ID equivalente ed è disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate stand-alone.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3691">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number and Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3692">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3692">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3693">15 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3693">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3694">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3694">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3695">Deve corrispondere a uno di questi due modelli:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3695">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3696">13 cifre seguite da uno spazio seguito da due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3696">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3697">oppure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3697">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3698">15 cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3698">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3699">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3699">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3700">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3700">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3701">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3701">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3702">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 95%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3702">A DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3703">La funzione Func_french_insee o Func_fr_insee trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3703">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3704">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_fr_insee.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3704">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3705">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3705">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3706">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3706">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3707">La funzione Func_french_insee o Func_fr_insee trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3707">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3708">Non vengono trovate parole chiave da Keyword_fr_insee.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3708">No keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3709">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3709">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France INSEE -->
<Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3735">Francia-numero di identificazione fiscale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3735">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3736">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3736">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3737">13 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3737">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3738">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3738">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3739">13 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3739">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3740">Una cifra che deve essere 0, 1, 2 o 3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3740">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3741">1 cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3741">1 digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3742">Uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3742">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3743">2 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3743">2 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3744">Uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3744">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3745">3 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3745">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3746">Uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3746">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3747">3 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3747">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3748">Uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3748">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3749">3 cifre di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3749">3 check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3750">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3750">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3751">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3751">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3752">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3752">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3753">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3753">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3754">La funzione  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3754">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3755">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3755">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3756">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3756">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3757">La funzione  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3757">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3796">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3796">three digits</span></span>
