## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3817">Germania-numero della patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3817">Germany driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3818">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è inclusa nel tipo di informazioni riservate del conducente dell'Unione europea ed è disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate stand-alone.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3818">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3819">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3819">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3820">combinazione di 11 cifre e lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3820">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3821">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3821">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3822">11 cifre e lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole/minuscole):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3822">11 digits and letters (not case sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3823">una cifra o una lettera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3823">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3824">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3824">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3825">sei cifre o lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3825">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3826">una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3826">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3827">una cifra o una lettera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3827">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3828">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3828">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3829">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3829">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3830">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3830">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3831">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3831">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3832">La funzione Func_german_drivers_license restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3832">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3833">Si verifica almeno una delle situazioni seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3833">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3834">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_german_drivers_license_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3834">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3835">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3835">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3836">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_german_drivers_license.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3836">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3837">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3837">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3930">Germania-numero di carta d'identità</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3930">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3931">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3931">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3932">dal 1 ° novembre 2010: nove lettere e cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3932">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3933">dal 1 ° aprile 1987 al 31 ottobre 2010:10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3933">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3934">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3934">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3935">dal 1 ° novembre 2010:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3935">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3936">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3936">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3937">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3937">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3938">dal 1 ° aprile 1987 al 31 ottobre 2010:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3938">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3939">dieci cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3939">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3940">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3940">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3941">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3941">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3942">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3942">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3943">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 65%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3943">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3944">L'espressione regolare Regex_germany_id_card trova contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3944">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3945">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_germany_id_card.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3945">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3961">Germania-numero di passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3961">Germany passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3962">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è inclusa nel tipo di informazioni riservate del numero di passaporto dell'Unione europea ed è disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate stand-alone.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3962">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3963">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3963">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3964">dieci cifre o lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3964">ten digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3965">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3965">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3966">Il modello deve includere tutti gli elementi seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3966">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3967">il primo carattere è una cifra o una lettera di questo set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3967">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3968">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3968">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3969">cinque cifre o lettere da questo set (C,-H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3969">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3970">una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3970">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3971">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3971">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3972">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3972">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3973">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3973">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3974">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3974">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3975">La funzione Func_german_passport restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3975">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3976">Viene trovata una parola chiave from `Keyword_german_passport` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3976">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3977">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3977">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3978">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3978">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3979">La funzione Func_german_passport_data restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3979">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3980">Viene trovata una parola chiave from `Keyword_german_passport` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3980">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3981">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3981">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3993">Germania-codice fiscale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3993">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3994">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3994">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3995">11 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3995">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-3996">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3996">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-3997">11 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3997">11 digits :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3998">Due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3998">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-3999">Uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-3999">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4000">Tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4000">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4001">Uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4001">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4002">Tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4002">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4003">Uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4003">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4004">Due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4004">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4005">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4005">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4006">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4006">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4007">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4007">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4008">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4008">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4009">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4009">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4010">La funzione  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4010">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4011">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4011">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4012">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4012">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4013">La funzione  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4013">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4039">Germania-numero di imposta sul valore aggiunto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4039">Germany value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4040">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4040">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4041">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4041">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4042">criteri di conformità della comunicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4042">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4043">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4043">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4044">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4044">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4045">Sicurezza delle app di Microsoft Cloud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4045">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4046">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4046">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4047">modello alfanumerico a 11 caratteri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4047">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4048">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4048">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4049">motivo alfanumerico di 11 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4049">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4050">una lettera D o d</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4050">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4051">una lettera E o e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4051">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4052">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4052">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4053">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4053">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4054">uno spazio o una virgola facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4054">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4055">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4055">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4056">uno spazio o una virgola facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4056">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4057">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4057">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4058">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4058">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4059">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4059">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4060">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4060">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4061">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4061">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4062">La funzione Func_germany_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4062">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4063">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4063">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4064">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4064">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4065">La funzione Func_germany_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4065">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4075">Grecia-Numero della patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4075">Greece driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4076">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è inclusa nel tipo di informazioni riservate del conducente dell'Unione europea ed è disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate stand-alone.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4076">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4077">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4077">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4078">nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4078">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4079">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4079">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4080">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4080">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4081">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4081">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4082">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4082">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4083">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4083">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4084">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4084">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4085">L'espressione regolare  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4085">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4086">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4086">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4103">Carta d'identità nazionale (Grecia)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4103">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4104">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4104">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4105">Combinazione di 7-8 lettere e numeri, oltre a un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4105">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4106">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4106">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4107">Sette lettere e numeri (formato precedente):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4107">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4108">Una lettera (qualsiasi lettera dell'alfabeto greco) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4108">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4109">Un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4109">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4110">Sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4110">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4111">Otto lettere e numeri (nuovo formato):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4111">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4112">Due lettere in maiuscolo sia in alfabeto latino che greco (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4112">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4113">Un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4113">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4114">Sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4114">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4115">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4115">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4116">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4116">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4117">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4117">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4118">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4118">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4119">L'espressione regolare Regex_greece_id_card trova contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4119">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4120">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_greece_id_card.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4120">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4121">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 65%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4121">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4122">L'espressione regolare Regex_greece_id_card trova contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4122">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4133">Grecia-numero di passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4133">Greece passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4134">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo nel tipo di informazioni riservate del numero di passaporto dell'Unione europea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4134">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4135">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4135">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4136">Due lettere seguite da sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4136">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4137">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4137">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4138">Due lettere seguite da 7 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4138">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4139">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4139">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4140">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4140">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4141">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4141">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4142">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4142">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4143">L'espressione regolare  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4143">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4144">Una parola chiave da  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` o `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` viene trovata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4144">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4145">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4145">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number_common"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4146">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4146">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4147">passaporto #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4147">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4148">passaporto #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4148">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4149">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4149">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4150">passaporti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4150">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4151">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4151">passportno</span></span>

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4161">Grecia-codice fiscale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4161">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4162">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4162">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4163">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4163">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4164">criteri di conformità della comunicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4164">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4165">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4165">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4166">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4166">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4167">Sicurezza delle app di Microsoft Cloud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4167">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4168">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4168">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4169">Nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4169">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4170">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4170">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4171">9 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4171">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4172">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4172">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4173">Non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4173">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4174">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4174">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4175">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4175">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4176">L'espressione regolare  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4176">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4177">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4177">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4206">Numero di carta di identità (HKID) di Hong Kong</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4206">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4207">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4207">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4208">Combinazione di 8-9 lettere e numeri. Facoltativamente, l’ultimo carattere può essere racchiuso tra parentesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4208">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4209">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4209">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4210">Combinazione di 8-9 lettere:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4210">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4211">1-2 lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4211">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4212">Sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4212">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4213">L'ultimo carattere (qualsiasi cifra o la lettera A), è rappresentato dal numero di controllo. Facoltativamente, può essere racchiuso tra parentesi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4213">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4214">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4214">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4215">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4215">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4216">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4216">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4217">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4217">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4218">La funzione Func_hong_kong_id_card trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4218">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4219">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_hong_kong_id_card.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4219">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4220">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4220">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4221">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 65%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4221">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4222">La funzione Func_hong_kong_id_card trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4222">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4223">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4223">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4263">Numero della patente di guida ungherese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4263">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4274">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4274">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4275">L'espressione regolare  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4275">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4292">Numero di identificazione personale Ungheria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4292">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4293">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4293">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4294">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4294">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4295">criteri di conformità della comunicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4295">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4296">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4296">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4297">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4297">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4298">Sicurezza delle app di Microsoft Cloud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4298">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4299">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4299">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4300">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4300">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4301">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4301">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4302">11 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4302">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4303">Una cifra che corrisponde al sesso (1-maschio, 2-Femmina, altri numeri sono possibili anche per i cittadini nati prima del 1900 o cittadini con doppia cittadinanza)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4303">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4304">Sei cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (AAMMGG)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4304">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4305">Tre cifre che corrispondono a un numero di serie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4305">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4306">Una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4306">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4307">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4307">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4308">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4308">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4309">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4309">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4310">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4310">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4311">La funzione  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4311">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4312">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4312">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4313">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4313">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4314">La funzione  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4314">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4334">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4334">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">

</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4365">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4365">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4366">La funzione  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4366">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />

       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4386">Numero di identificazione fiscale ungherese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4386">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4387">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4387">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4388">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4388">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4389">criteri di conformità della comunicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4389">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4390">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4390">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4391">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4391">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4392">Sicurezza delle app di Microsoft Cloud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4392">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4393">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4393">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4394">Dieci cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4394">Ten digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4395">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4395">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4396">Dieci cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4396">Ten digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4397">Una cifra che deve essere "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4397">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4398">Otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4398">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4399">Una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4399">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4400">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4400">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4401">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4401">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4402">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4402">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4403">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4403">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4404">La funzione  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4404">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4405">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4405">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4406">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4406">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4407">La funzione  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4407">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4433">Numero dell'imposta sul valore aggiunto (Ungheria)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4433">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4434">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4434">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4435">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4435">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4436">criteri di conformità della comunicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4436">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4437">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4437">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4438">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4438">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4439">Sicurezza delle app di Microsoft Cloud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4439">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4440">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4440">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4441">motivo alfanumerico di 10 caratteri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4441">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4442">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4442">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4443">motivo alfanumerico di 10 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4443">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4444">2 lettere-HU o Hu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4444">2 letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4445">spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4445">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4446">8 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4446">8 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4447">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4447">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4448">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4448">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4449">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4449">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4450">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4450">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4451">La funzione Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4451">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4452">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4452">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4453">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4453">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4454">La funzione Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4454">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4468">India-numero di conto permanente (PAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4468">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4469">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4469">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4470">10 lettere o cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4470">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4471">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4471">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4472">10 lettere o cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4472">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4473">Cinque lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4473">Five letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4474">Quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4474">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4475">Una lettera, ovvero una cifra di controllo alfabetica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4475">A letter which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4476">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4476">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4477">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4477">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4478">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4478">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4479">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4479">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4480">L'espressione regolare Regex_india_permanent_account_number trova contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4480">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4481">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_india_permanent_account_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4481">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4482">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4482">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
<Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4487">Numero Aadhaar (India Unique Identification)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4487">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4488">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4488">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4489">12 cifre contenenti spazi o trattini facoltativi </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4489">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4490">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4490">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4491">12 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4491">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4492">Quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4492">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4493">Uno spazio o un trattino facoltativo </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4493">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4494">Quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4494">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4495">Uno spazio o un trattino facoltativo </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4495">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4496">L'ultimo carattere, ovvero il numero di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4496">The final digit which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4497">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4497">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4498">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4498">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4499">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4499">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4500">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4500">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4501">La funzione Func_india_aadhaar trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4501">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4502">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_india_aadhar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4502">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4503">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4503">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4504">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4504">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4505">La funzione Func_india_aadhaar trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4505">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4506">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4506">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4513">Numero di carta di identità (KTP) (Indonesia)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4513">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4514">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4514">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4515">16 cifre contenenti punti facoltativi </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4515">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4516">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4516">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4517">16 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4517">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4518">Codice provincia a due cifre </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4518">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4519">Un punto (facoltativo) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4519">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4520">Codice città o area a due cifre </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4520">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4521">Codice sotto-distretto a due cifre </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4521">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4522">Un punto (facoltativo) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4522">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4523">Sei cifre nel formato GGMMAA, ovvero la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4523">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4524">Un punto (facoltativo) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4524">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4525">Quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4525">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4526">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4526">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4527">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4527">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4528">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4528">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4529">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4529">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4530">L'espressione regolare Regex_indonesia_id_card trova contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4530">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4531">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_indonesia_id_card.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4531">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4537">Numero di conto bancario internazionale (IBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4537">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4538">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4538">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4539">Codice paese (due lettere) più cifre di controllo (due cifre) più numero BBAN (fino a 30 caratteri)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4539">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4540">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4540">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4541">Il modello deve includere tutti gli elementi seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4541">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4542">Codice paese a due lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4542">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4543">Due cifre di controllo (seguite da uno spazio facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4543">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4544">1-7 gruppi di quattro lettere o cifre (possono essere separati da spazi)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4544">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4545">1-3 lettere o cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4545">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4546">Il formato di ogni paese è leggermente diverso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4546">The format for each country is slightly different.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4547">Il tipo di informazioni riservate IBAN copre questi 60 paesi:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4547">The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4548">ad, AE, al, at, AZ, BA, be, BG, BH, ch, CR, CY, CZ, de, DK, do, EE, es, Fi, fo, fr, GB, GE, Gi, GL, gr, HR, HU, IE, il, is, it, kW, KZ, lb, li, LT, Lu, LV, MC, MD, me, MK, Mr, MT, MU, NL, no, pl, PT, ro, RS, SA, se, si, SK, SM, TN, TR, VG</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4548">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4549">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4549">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4550">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4550">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4551">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4551">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4552">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4552">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4553">La funzione Func_iban restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4553">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4554">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4554">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4563">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4563">No</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4565">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4565">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4568">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4568">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

```xml

      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4570">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4570">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4571">Qualsiasi termine del dizionario di parole chiave Dictionary_icd_10_updated, basato sulla [classificazione internazionale delle malattie, la decima revisione, la modifica clinica (ICD-10-cm)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4571">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4572">Questo tipo di ricerca viene visualizzato solo per il termine, non per i codici assicurativi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4572">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4573">Qualsiasi termine del dizionario di parole chiave Dictionary_icd_10_codes, basato sulla [classificazione internazionale delle malattie, la decima revisione, la modifica clinica (ICD-10-cm)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4573">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4574">Questo tipo di ricerca è solo per i codici assicurativi, non per la descrizione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4574">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4576">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4576">Format</span></span>
