<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4581">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4581">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4582">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4582">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4583">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4583">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4593">Indirizzo IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4593">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4594">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4594">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4595">IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4595">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4596">Modello complesso che rappresenta le versioni formattate (punti) e quelle non formattate (senza punti) degli indirizzi IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4596">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4597">IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4597">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4598">Modello complesso che rappresenta i numeri dell'indirizzo IPv6 non formattati (include i due punti)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4598">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4599">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4599">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4600">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4600">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4601">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4601">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4602">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4602">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4603">Nel caso di IPv6, un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4603">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4604">L'espressione regolare Regex_ipv6_address restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4604">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4605">Non vengono trovate parole chiave da Keyword_ipaddress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4605">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4606">Nel caso di IPv4, un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 95%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4606">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4607">L'espressione regolare Regex_ipv4_address restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4607">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4608">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_ipaddress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4608">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4609">Nel caso di IPv6, un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 95%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4609">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4610">L'espressione regolare Regex_ipv6_address restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4610">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4611">Non vengono trovate parole chiave da Keyword_ipaddress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4611">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4620">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo nel tipo di informazioni riservate del conducente dell'Unione europea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4620">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4629">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4629">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4630">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4630">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4648">Irlanda-numero di passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4648">Ireland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4649">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo nel tipo di informazioni riservate del numero di passaporto dell'Unione europea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4649">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4652">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4652">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4653">Due lettere o cifre seguite da sette cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4653">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4654">Due cifre o lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole/minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4654">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4657">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4657">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4658">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4658">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4659">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4659">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4660">L'espressione regolare  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4660">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4661">Una parola chiave da  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` o `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` viene trovata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4661">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4682">Irlanda-numero di servizio pubblico personale (PPS)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4682">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4683">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4684">Formato precedente (fino al 31 dicembre 2012):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4684">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4685">sette cifre seguite da 1-2 lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4685">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4686">Nuovo formato (1 gen 2013 e successive):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4686">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4687">sette cifre seguite da due lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4687">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4688">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4688">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4689">Formato precedente (fino al 31 dicembre 2012):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4689">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4690">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4690">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4691">una o due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4691">one to two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4692">Nuovo formato (1 gen 2013 e successive):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4692">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4693">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4693">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4694">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole/minuscole) che corrisponde a una cifra di controllo alfabetica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4694">a letter (not case sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4695">Una lettera facoltativa nell'intervallo A-I o "W"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4695">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4696">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4696">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4697">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4697">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4698">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4698">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4699">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4699">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4700">La funzione Func_ireland_pps trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4700">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4701">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4701">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4702">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4702">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4703">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 65%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4703">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4704">La funzione Func_ireland_pps trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4704">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4705">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4705">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4750">Israele-numero di conto corrente bancario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4750">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4751">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4751">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4752">13 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4752">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4753">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4753">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4754">Formattato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4754">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4755">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4755">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4756">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4756">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4757">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4757">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4758">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4758">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4759">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4759">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4760">Formattato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4760">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4761">13 cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4761">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4762">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4762">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4763">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4763">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4764">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4764">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4765">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4765">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4766">L'espressione regolare Regex_israel_bank_account_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4766">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4767">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_israel_bank_account_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4767">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4768">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4768">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4769">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4769">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4770">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4770">Bank Account Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4772">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4772">Account Number</span></span>

## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4774">Israele-numero di identificazione nazionale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4774">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4775">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4775">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4776">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4776">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4777">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4777">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4778">nove cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4778">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4779">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4779">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4780">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4780">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4781">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4781">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4782">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4782">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4783">La funzione Func_israeli_national_id_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4783">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4784">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_Israel_National_ID.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4784">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4785">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4785">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4786">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4786">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4787">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4787">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4788">מספר זהות</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4788">מספר זהות</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4789">National ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4789">National ID Number</span></span>
   
## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4790">Italiano numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4790">Italy driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4791">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è inclusa nel tipo di informazioni riservate del conducente dell'Unione europea ed è disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate stand-alone.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4791">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4792">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4792">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4793">una combinazione di 10 lettere e cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4793">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4794">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4794">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4795">una combinazione di 10 lettere e cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4795">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4796">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4796">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4797">la lettera "A" o "V" (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4797">the letter "A" or "V" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4798">sette lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole/minuscole), cifre o caratteri di sottolineatura</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4798">seven letters (not case sensitive), digits, or the underscore character</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4799">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4799">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4800">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4800">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4801">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4801">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4802">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4802">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4803">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4803">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4804">L'espressione regolare Regex_italy_drivers_license_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4804">The regular expression Regex_italy_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4805">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4805">A keyword from Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
<Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4810">Codice fiscale Italia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4810">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4811">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4811">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4812">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4812">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4813">criteri di conformità della comunicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4813">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4814">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4814">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4815">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4815">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4816">Sicurezza delle app di Microsoft Cloud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4816">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4817">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4817">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4818">una combinazione di 16 caratteri di lettere e cifre nel modello specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4818">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4819">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4819">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4820">Combinazione di lettere e cifre di 16 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4820">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4821">tre lettere che corrispondono alle prime tre consonanti del nome di famiglia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4821">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4822">tre lettere che corrispondono alla prima, terza e quarta consonante del primo nome</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4822">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4823">due cifre che corrispondono alle ultime cifre dell'anno di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4823">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4824">una lettera che corrisponde alla lettera per il mese di nascita: le lettere vengono utilizzate in ordine alfabetico, ma vengono utilizzate solo le lettere da a a E, H, L, M, P, R e T (pertanto, gennaio è A e ottobre è R)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4824">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4825">due cifre che corrispondono al giorno del mese di nascita, al fine di distinguere tra i sessi, 40 viene aggiunto al giorno di nascita per le donne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4825">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4826">quattro cifre che corrispondono al codice di area specifico per il comune in cui è nata la persona (i codici a livello nazionale vengono utilizzati per i paesi esteri)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4826">four digits that corresponds to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4827">una cifra di parità</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4827">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4828">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4828">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4829">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4829">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4830">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4830">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4831">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4831">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4832">La funzione  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4832">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4833">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4833">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4834">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4834">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4835">La funzione  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4835">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4870">Numero di passaporto Italia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4870">Italy passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4871">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo nel tipo di informazioni riservate del numero di passaporto dell'Unione europea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4871">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4872">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4872">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4873">due lettere o cifre seguite da sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4873">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4874">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4874">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4875">due lettere o cifre seguite da sette cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4875">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4876">due cifre o lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4876">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4877">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4877">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4878">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4878">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4879">non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4879">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4880">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4880">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4881">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4881">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4882">L'espressione regolare  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4882">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4883">Una parola chiave da  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` o `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` viene trovata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4883">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4911">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4911">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4912">13 caratteri alfanumerici con delimitatori opzionali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4912">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4913">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4913">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4914">13 caratteri alfanumerici con delimitatori facoltativi:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4914">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4915">I o i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4915">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4916">T o t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4916">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4917">spazio facoltativo, punto, segno meno o virgola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4917">optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4918">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4918">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4919">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4919">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4920">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4920">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4921">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4921">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4922">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4922">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4923">La funzione Func_italy_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4923">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4924">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4924">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4925">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4925">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4926">La funzione Func_italy_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4926">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4934">Giappone-numero di conto corrente bancario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4934">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4935">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4935">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4936">sette o otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4936">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4937">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4937">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4938">numero di conto corrente bancario:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4938">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4939">sette o otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4939">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4940">codice della filiale del conto corrente bancario:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4940">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4941">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4941">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4942">uno spazio o un trattino (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4942">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4943">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4943">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4944">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4945">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4945">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-4946">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4946">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4947">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4947">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4948">La funzione Func_jp_bank_account restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4948">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4949">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_jp_bank_account.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4949">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4950">Si verifica una delle situazioni seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4950">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4951">La funzione Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4951">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4952">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4952">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-4953">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4953">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4954">La funzione Func_jp_bank_account restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4954">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-4955">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_jp_bank_account.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-4955">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5014">Giappone-numero della patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5014">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5015">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5015">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5016">12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5016">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5017">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5017">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5018">12 cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5018">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5019">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5019">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5020">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5020">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5021">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5021">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5022">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5022">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5023">La funzione Func_jp_drivers_license_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5023">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5024">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5024">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

```xml

      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

```xml
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5162">11 cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5162">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5182">Giappone-numero di previdenza sociale (SIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5182">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5183">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5183">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5184">7-12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5184">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5185">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5185">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5186">7-12 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5186">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5187">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5187">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5188">un trattino (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5188">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5189">sei cifre o</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5189">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5190">7-12 cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5190">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5191">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5191">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5192">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5192">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5193">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5193">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5194">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5194">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5195">La funzione Func_jp_sin restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5195">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5196">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_jp_sin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5196">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5197">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5197">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5198">La funzione Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5198">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5199">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_jp_sin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5199">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5218">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5218">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5219">L'espressione regolare  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5219">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
```

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5236">Codice personale Lettonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5236">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5237">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5237">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5238">11 cifre e un segno meno facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5238">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5239">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5239">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5240">Formato precedente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5240">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5241">11 cifre e un trattino:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5241">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5242">sei cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (GGMMAA)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5242">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5243">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5243">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5244">una cifra che corrisponde al secolo di nascita ("0" per il XIX secolo, "1" per il XX secolo e "2" per il XXI secolo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5244">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5245">quattro cifre, generate in modo casuale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5245">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5246">Nuovo formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5246">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5247">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5247">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5248">Due cifre "32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5248">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5249">9 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5249">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5250">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5250">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5251">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5251">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5252">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5252">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5253">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5253">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5254">La funzione  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` o l'espressione Regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5254">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5255">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5255">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5256">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5256">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5257">La funzione  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` o l'espressione Regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5257">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5320">Lettonia-numero di passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5320">Latvia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5321">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo nel tipo di informazioni riservate del numero di passaporto dell'Unione europea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5321">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5322">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5322">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5323">due lettere o cifre seguite da sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5323">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5324">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5324">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5325">due lettere o cifre seguite da sette cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5325">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5326">due cifre o lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5326">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5327">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5327">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5328">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5328">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5329">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5329">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5330">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5330">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5331">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5331">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5332">L'espressione regolare  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5332">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5333">Una parola chiave da  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` o `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` viene trovata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5333">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5353">Lituania-numero della patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5353">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5354">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo nel tipo di informazioni riservate del conducente dell'Unione europea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5354">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5355">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5355">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5356">otto cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5356">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5357">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5357">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5358">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5358">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5359">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5359">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5360">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5360">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5361">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5361">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5362">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5362">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5363">L'espressione regolare  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5363">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5364">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5364">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
```

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5380">Codice personale Lituania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5380">Lithuania personal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5381">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5381">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5382">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5382">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5383">criteri di conformità della comunicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5383">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5384">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5384">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5385">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5385">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5386">Sicurezza delle app di Microsoft Cloud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5386">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5387">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5387">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5388">11 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5388">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5389">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5389">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5390">11 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5390">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5391">una cifra (1-6) che corrisponde al sesso e al secolo della nascita della persona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5391">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5392">sei cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (AAMMGG)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5392">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5393">tre cifre che corrispondono al numero di serie della data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5393">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5394">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5394">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5395">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5395">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5396">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5396">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5397">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5397">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5398">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5398">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5399">La funzione  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5399">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5400">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5400">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5401">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5401">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5402">La funzione  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5402">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5437">Numero del passaporto della Lituania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5437">Lithuania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5438">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo nel tipo di informazioni riservate del numero di passaporto dell'Unione europea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5438">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5439">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5439">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5440">otto cifre o lettere senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5440">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5441">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5441">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5442">otto cifre o lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5442">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5443">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5443">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5444">non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5444">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5445">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5445">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5446">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5446">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5447">L'espressione regolare  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5447">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5448">Una parola chiave da  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` o `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` viene trovata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5448">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5469">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5469">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5474">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5474">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5492">Numero di identificazione nazionale del Lussemburgo (persone fisiche)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5492">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5493">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5493">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5494">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5494">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5495">criteri di conformità della comunicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5495">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5496">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5496">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5497">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5497">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5498">Sicurezza delle app di Microsoft Cloud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5498">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5499">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5499">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5500">13 cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5500">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5501">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5501">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5502">13 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5502">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5503">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5503">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5504">due cifre di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5504">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5505">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5505">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5506">sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5506">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5507">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5507">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5508">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5508">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5509">La funzione  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5509">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5510">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5510">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5511">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5511">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5512">La funzione  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5512">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
