## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5535">Numero di passaporto del Lussemburgo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5535">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5536">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo nel tipo di informazioni riservate del numero di passaporto dell'Unione europea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5536">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5537">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5537">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5538">otto cifre o lettere senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5538">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5539">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5539">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5540">otto cifre o lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5540">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5541">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5541">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5542">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5542">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5543">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5543">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5544">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5544">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5545">L'espressione regolare  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5545">The regular expression  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5546">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5546">A keyword from  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_nation_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5566">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5566">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5567">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5567">Yes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5569">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5569">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5570">La funzione  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5570">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5572">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5572">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5573">La funzione  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5573">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5613">Numero di carta di identificazione Malaysia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5613">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5614">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5614">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5615">12 cifre contenenti lineette facoltative</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5615">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5616">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5616">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5617">12 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5617">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5618">sei cifre nel formato AAMMGG, ovvero la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5618">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5619">un trattino (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5619">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5620">codice posto-di-nascita a due lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5620">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5621">un trattino (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5621">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5622">tre cifre casuali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5622">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5623">codice di genere a una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5623">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5624">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5624">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5625">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5625">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5626">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5626">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5627">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5627">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5628">L'espressione regolare Regex_malaysia_id_card_number trova contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5628">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5629">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5629">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5656">Numero della patente di guida di Malta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5656">Malta driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5657">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo nel tipo di informazioni riservate del conducente dell'Unione europea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5657">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5658">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5658">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5659">Combinazione di due caratteri e di sei cifre nel modello specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5659">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5660">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5660">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5661">combinazione di due caratteri e di sei cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5661">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5662">due caratteri (cifre o lettere, non con distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5662">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5663">uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5663">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5664">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5664">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5665">uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5665">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5666">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5666">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5667">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5667">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5668">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5668">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5669">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5669">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5670">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5670">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5671">L'espressione regolare  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5671">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5672">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5672">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
 <Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5688">Numero di carta di identità di Malta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5688">Malta identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5689">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5689">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5690">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5690">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5691">criteri di conformità della comunicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5691">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5692">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5692">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5693">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5693">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5694">Sicurezza delle app di Microsoft Cloud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5694">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5695">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5695">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5696">sette cifre seguite da una lettera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5696">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5697">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5697">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5698">sette cifre seguite da una lettera:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5698">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5699">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5699">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5700">una lettera in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5700">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5701">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5701">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5702">Non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5702">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5703">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5703">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5704">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5704">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5705">L'espressione regolare  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5705">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5706">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5706">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5707">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 65%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5707">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5708">L'espressione regolare  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5708">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5725">Numero di passaporto di Malta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5725">Malta passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5726">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo nel tipo di informazioni riservate del numero di passaporto dell'Unione europea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5726">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5727">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5727">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5728">sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5728">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5729">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5729">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5730">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5730">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5731">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5731">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5732">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5732">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5733">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5733">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5734">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5734">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5735">L'espressione regolare  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5735">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5736">Una parola chiave da  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` o `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` viene trovata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5736">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5753">Numero di identificazione fiscale di Malta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5753">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5754">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5754">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5755">Per cittadini maltesi:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5755">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5756">sette cifre e una lettera nel modello specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5756">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5757">Nazionali non maltesi e soggetti maltesi:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5757">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5758">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5758">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5759">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5759">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5760">Nazionali maltesi: sette cifre e una lettera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5760">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5761">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5761">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5762">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5762">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5763">Nazionali non maltesi e soggetti maltesi: nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5763">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5764">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5764">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5765">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5765">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5766">Non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5766">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5767">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5767">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5768">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5768">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5769">La Regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  o `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` trova il contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5769">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5770">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5770">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5771">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 65%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5771">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5772">La Regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` o `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` trova il contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5772">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5805">Numero di servizio del cittadino (BSN) (Paesi Bassi)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5805">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5806">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5806">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5807">otto-nove cifre contenenti spazi facoltativi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5807">eight-nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5808">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5808">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5809">otto-nove cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5809">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5810">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5810">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5811">uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5811">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5812">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5812">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5813">uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5813">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5814">due-tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5814">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5815">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5815">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5816">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5816">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5817">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5817">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5818">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5818">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5819">La funzione Func_netherlands_bsn trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5819">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5820">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_netherlands_bsn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5820">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5821">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5821">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5845">Numero della patente di guida (Paesi Bassi)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5845">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5849">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5849">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5850">dieci cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5850">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5851">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5851">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5852">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5852">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5853">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5853">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5854">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5854">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5855">L'espressione regolare  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5855">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5875">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo nel tipo di informazioni riservate del numero di passaporto dell'Unione europea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5875">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5876">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5876">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5878">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5878">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5879">nove lettere o cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5879">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5880">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5880">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5881">non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5881">not applicable</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5883">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5883">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5884">L'espressione regolare  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5884">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5885">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5885">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">

        </Pattern>
```

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5895">Numero di identificazione fiscale per i Paesi Bassi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5895">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5896">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5896">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5897">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5897">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5898">criteri di conformità della comunicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5898">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5899">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5899">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5900">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5900">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5901">Sicurezza delle app di Microsoft Cloud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5901">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5902">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5902">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5903">nove cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5903">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5904">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5904">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5905">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5905">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5906">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5906">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5907">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5907">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5908">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5908">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5909">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5909">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5910">La funzione  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5910">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5911">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5911">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5912">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 65%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5912">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5913">La funzione  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5913">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5956">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5956">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5957">Sicurezza delle app di Microsoft Cloud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5957">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5958">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5958">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5965">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5965">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5968">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5968">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-5969">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5969">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5970">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5970">Yes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5972">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5972">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5973">La funzione Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5973">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5974">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5974">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-5975">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5975">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-5976">La funzione Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-5976">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6106">Numero di ricavo interno della Nuova Zelanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6106">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6107">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6107">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6108">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6108">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6109">criteri di conformità della comunicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6109">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6110">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6110">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6111">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6111">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6112">Sicurezza delle app di Microsoft Cloud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6112">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6113">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6113">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6114">otto o nove cifre con delimitatori opzionali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6114">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6115">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6115">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6116">otto o nove cifre con delimitatori opzionali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6116">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6117">due o tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6117">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6118">uno spazio o un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6118">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6119">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6119">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6120">uno spazio o un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6120">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6121">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6121">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6122">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6122">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6123">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6123">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6124">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6124">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6125">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6125">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6126">La funzione Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6126">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6127">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6127">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6128">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6128">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6129">La funzione Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6129">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6138">Numero del Ministero della sanità neozelandese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6138">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6139">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6139">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6140">tre lettere, uno spazio (facoltativo) e quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6140">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6141">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6141">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6142">tre lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole/minuscole) uno spazio (facoltativo) quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6142">three letters (not case sensitive) a space (optional) four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6143">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6143">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6144">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6144">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6145">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6145">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6146">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6146">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6147">La funzione Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6147">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6148">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_nz_terms.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6148">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6149">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6149">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
<Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6174">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6174">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6175">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6175">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6176">La funzione Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6176">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6177">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6177">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6178">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 65%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6178">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6179">La funzione Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6179">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6187">Numero di identificazione norvegese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6187">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6188">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6188">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6189">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6189">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6190">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6190">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6191">11 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6191">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6192">sei cifre nel formato GGMMAA, ovvero la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6192">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6193">numero individuale a tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6193">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6194">due cifre di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6194">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6195">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6195">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6196">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6196">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6197">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6197">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6198">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6198">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6199">La funzione Func_norway_id_number trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6199">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6200">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_norway_id_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6200">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6201">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6201">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6202">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6202">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6203">La funzione Func_norway_id_numbe trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6203">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6204">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6204">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6213">Numero di identificazione multifunzione unificato Filippine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6213">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6214">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6214">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6215">12 cifre separate da dei segni meno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6215">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6216">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6216">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6217">12 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6217">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6218">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6218">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6219">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6219">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6220">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6220">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6221">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6221">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6222">una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6222">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6223">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6223">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6224">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6224">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6225">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6225">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6226">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6226">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6227">L'espressione regolare Regex_philippines_unified_id trova contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6227">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6228">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_philippines_id.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6228">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6235">Numero della patente di guida (Polonia)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6235">Poland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6236">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo nel tipo di informazioni riservate del conducente dell'Unione europea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6236">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6239">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6239">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6240">14 cifre e 2 barre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6240">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6241">cinque cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6241">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6242">una barra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6242">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6243">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6243">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6244">una barra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6244">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6245">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6245">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6246">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6246">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6247">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6247">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6248">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6248">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6249">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6249">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6250">L'espressione regolare  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6250">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6251">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6251">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6267">Carta di identità in Polonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6267">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6268">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6268">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6276">La funzione Func_polish_national_id restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6276">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6278">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6278">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6279">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6279">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6289">ID nazionale Polonia (PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6289">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6290">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6290">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6291">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6291">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6292">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6292">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6293">6 cifre che rappresentano la data di nascita nel formato AAMMGG</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6293">6 digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6294">4 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6294">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6295">1 cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6295">1 check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6296">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6296">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6297">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6297">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6298">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6298">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6299">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6299">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6300">La funzione Func_pesel_identification_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6300">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6301">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_pesel_identification_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6301">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6302">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6302">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6303">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6303">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6304">La funzione Func_pesel_identification_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6304">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6305">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6305">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6317">Polonia-numero del passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6317">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6318">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è inclusa nel tipo di informazioni riservate del numero di passaporto dell'Unione europea ed è disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate stand-alone.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6318">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6319">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6319">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6320">due lettere e sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6320">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6321">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6321">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6322">Due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole/minuscole) seguite da sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6322">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6323">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6323">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6324">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6324">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6325">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6325">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6326">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6326">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6327">La funzione Func_polish_passport_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6327">The function Func_polish_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6328">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6328">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6329">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6329">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
</Version>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6421">Portogallo-numero di carta Citizen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6421">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6422">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6422">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6423">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6423">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6424">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6424">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6425">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6425">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6426">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6426">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6427">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6427">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6428">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6428">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6429">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6429">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6430">L'espressione regolare Regex_portugal_citizen_card trova contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6430">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6431">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_portugal_citizen_card.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6431">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6451">Portogallo-numero della patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6451">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6452">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo nel tipo di informazioni riservate del conducente dell'Unione europea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6452">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6453">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6453">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6454">due lettere seguite da un numero di sette numeri nel modello specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6454">two letters followed by a seven numbers in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6455">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6455">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6456">due lettere seguite da sette numeri con caratteri speciali:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6456">two letters followed by seven numbers with special characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6457">due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6457">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6458">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6458">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6459">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6459">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6460">uno spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6460">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6461">una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6461">one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6462">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6462">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6463">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6463">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6464">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6464">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6465">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6465">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6466">L'espressione regolare  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6466">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6467">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6467">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6483">Portogallo-numero di passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6483">Portugal passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6484">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo nel tipo di informazioni riservate del numero di passaporto dell'Unione europea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6484">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6485">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6485">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6486">una lettera seguita da sei cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6486">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6487">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6487">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6488">una lettera seguita da sei cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6488">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6489">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6489">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6490">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6490">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6491">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6491">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6492">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6492">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6493">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6493">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6494">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6494">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6495">L'espressione regolare  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6495">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6496">Una parola chiave da  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` o `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` viene trovata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6496">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
