## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6520">Portogallo codice di identificazione fiscale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6520">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6521">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6521">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6522">nove cifre con spazi facoltativi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6522">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6523">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6523">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6524">3 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6524">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6525">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6525">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6526">3 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6526">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6527">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6527">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6528">3 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6528">3 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6529">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6529">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6530">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6530">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6531">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6531">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6532">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6532">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6533">La funzione  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6533">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6534">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6534">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6535">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 65%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6535">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6536">La funzione  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6536">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6561">Numero della patente di guida Romania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6561">Romania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6562">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo nel tipo di informazioni riservate del conducente dell'Unione europea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6562">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6563">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6563">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6564">un carattere seguito da otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6564">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6565">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6565">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6566">un carattere seguito da otto cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6566">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6567">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) o cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6567">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6568">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6568">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6569">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6569">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6570">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6570">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6571">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6571">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6572">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6572">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6573">L'espressione regolare  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6573">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6574">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6574">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6590">Codice numerico personale Romania (CNP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6590">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6591">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6591">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6592">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6592">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6593">criteri di conformità della comunicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6593">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6594">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6594">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6595">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6595">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6596">Sicurezza delle app di Microsoft Cloud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6596">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6597">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6597">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6598">13 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6598">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6599">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6599">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6600">1 cifra da 1-9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6600">1 digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6601">6 cifre che rappresentano la data di nascita (AAMMGG)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6601">6 digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6602">2 cifre che possono essere 01-52 o 99</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6602">2 digits which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6603">4 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6603">4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6604">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6604">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6605">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6605">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6606">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6606">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6607">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6607">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6608">La funzione  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6608">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6609">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6609">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6610">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6610">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6611">La funzione  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6611">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6662">Numero di passaporto Romania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6662">Romania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6663">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo nel tipo di informazioni riservate del numero di passaporto dell'Unione europea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6663">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6664">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6664">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6665">otto o nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6665">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6666">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6666">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6667">otto o nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6667">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6668">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6668">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6669">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6669">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6670">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6670">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6671">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6671">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6672">L'espressione regolare  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6672">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6673">Una parola chiave da  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` o `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` viene trovata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6673">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

```xml
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6762">Arabia Saudita - Identificativo nazionale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6762">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6763">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6763">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6764">dieci cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6764">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6765">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6765">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6766">dieci cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6766">ten consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6767">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6767">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6768">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6768">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6769">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6769">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6770">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6770">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6771">L'espressione regolare Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6771">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6772">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6772">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6779">Numero di carta di identità di registrazione nazionale (NRIC) (Singapore)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6779">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6780">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6780">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6781">nove lettere e cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6781">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6782">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6782">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6783">nove lettere e cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6783">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6784">la lettera "F", "G", "S" o "T" (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6784">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6785">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6785">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6786">una cifra di controllo alfabetica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6786">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6787">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6787">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6788">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6788">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6789">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6789">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6790">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6790">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6791">L'espressione regolare Regex_singapore_nric trova contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6791">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6792">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_singapore_nric.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6792">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6793">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6793">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6794">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6794">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6795">L'espressione regolare Regex_singapore_nric trova contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6795">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6796">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6796">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6807">Slovacchia-numero della patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6807">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6808">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo nel tipo di informazioni riservate del conducente dell'Unione europea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6808">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6811">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6811">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6816">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6816">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6817">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6817">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6818">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6818">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6819">L'espressione regolare  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6819">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">

          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovaknia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
```

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6836">Slovacchia-numero personale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6836">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6837">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6837">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6838">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6838">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6839">criteri di conformità della comunicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6839">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6840">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6840">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6841">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6841">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6842">Sicurezza delle app di Microsoft Cloud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6842">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6843">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6843">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6844">nove o dieci cifre che contengono una barra rovesciata facoltativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6844">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6845">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6845">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6846">6 cifre che rappresentano la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6846">6 digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6847">barra facoltativa (/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6847">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6848">3 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6848">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6849">1 cifra di controllo facoltativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6849">1 optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6850">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6850">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6851">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6851">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6852">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6852">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6853">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6853">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6854">La funzione  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6854">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6855">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6855">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6856">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 65%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6856">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6857">La funzione  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6857">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6904">Slovacchia-numero di passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6904">Slovakia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6905">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo nel tipo di informazioni riservate del numero di passaporto dell'Unione europea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6905">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6906">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6906">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6907">una cifra o una lettera seguita da sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6907">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6908">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6908">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6909">una cifra o una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole/minuscole) seguita da sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6909">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6910">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6910">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6911">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6911">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6912">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6912">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6913">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6913">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6914">L'espressione regolare  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6914">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6915">Una parola chiave da  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` o `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` viene trovata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6915">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6934">Numero della patente di guida sloveno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6934">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6935">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo nel tipo di informazioni riservate del conducente dell'Unione europea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6935">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6936">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6936">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6937">nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6937">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6938">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6938">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6939">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6939">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6940">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6940">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6941">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6941">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6942">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6942">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6943">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6943">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6944">L'espressione regolare  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6944">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6945">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6945">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6961">Slovenia numero di cittadini Master Unique</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6961">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6962">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6962">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6963">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6963">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6964">criteri di conformità della comunicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6964">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6965">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6965">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6966">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6966">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6967">Sicurezza delle app di Microsoft Cloud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6967">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6968">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6968">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6969">13 cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6969">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6970">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6970">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6971">13 cifre nel modello specificato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6971">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6972">sette cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (DDMMLLL), dove "LLL" corrisponde alle ultime tre cifre dell'anno di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6972">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6973">due cifre che corrispondono all'area di nascita "50"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6973">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6974">tre cifre che corrispondono a una combinazione di genere e numero di serie per le persone nate nello stesso giorno (000-499 per il maschio e 500-999 per le femmine)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6974">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6975">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6975">one check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6977">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6977">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-6978">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6978">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6979">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6979">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6980">La funzione  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6980">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6981">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6981">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-6982">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6982">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-6983">La funzione  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-6983">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7011">Slovenia-numero di passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7011">Slovenia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7012">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo nel tipo di informazioni riservate del numero di passaporto dell'Unione europea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7012">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7013">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7013">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7014">due lettere seguite da sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7014">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7015">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7015">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7016">due lettere seguite da sette cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7016">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7017">la lettera "P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7017">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7018">una lettera maiuscola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7018">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7019">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7019">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7020">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7020">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7021">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7021">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7022">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7022">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7023">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7023">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7024">L'espressione regolare  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7024">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7025">Una parola chiave da  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` o `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` viene trovata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7025">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7064">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 65%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7064">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7065">La funzione  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7065">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7089">Numero di identificazione Sud Africa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7089">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7090">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7090">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7091">13 cifre che possono contenere spazi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7091">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7092">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7092">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7093">13 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7093">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7094">sei cifre nel formato AAMMGG, ovvero la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7094">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7095">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7095">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7096">un indicatore di cittadinanza a una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7096">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7097">la cifra "8" o "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7097">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7098">una cifra che corrisponde a una cifra di checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7098">one digit which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7099">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7099">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7100">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7100">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7101">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7101">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7102">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7102">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7103">La funzione Func_south_africa_identification_number trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7103">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7104">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_south_africa_identification_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7104">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7105">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7105">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7111">Numero di registrazione residente in Corea del sud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7111">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7112">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7112">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7113">13 cifre contenenti un segno meno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7113">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7114">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7114">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7115">13 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7115">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7116">sei cifre nel formato AAMMGG, ovvero la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7116">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7117">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7117">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7118">una cifra determinata dal secolo e dal sesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7118">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7119">codice regione-di-nascita a quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7119">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7120">una cifra utilizzata per distinguere gli utenti per i quali i numeri precedenti sono identici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7120">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7121">una cifra di controllo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7121">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7122">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7122">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7123">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7123">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7124">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7124">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7125">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7125">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7126">La funzione Func_south_korea_resident_number trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7126">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7127">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_south_korea_resident_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7127">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7128">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7128">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7129">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7129">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7130">La funzione Func_south_korea_resident_number trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7130">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7131">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7131">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7139">Spagna-numero della patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7139">Spain driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7140">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo nel tipo di informazioni riservate del conducente dell'Unione europea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7140">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7142">otto cifre seguite da un carattere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7142">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7143">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7143">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7144">otto cifre seguite da un carattere:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7144">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7147">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7147">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7148">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7148">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7149">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7149">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7150">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7150">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7151">La funzione  `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7151">The function  `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7152">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7152">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7189">DNI Spagna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7189">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7190">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7190">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7191">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7191">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7192">criteri di conformità della comunicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7192">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7193">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7193">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7194">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7194">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7195">Sicurezza delle app di Microsoft Cloud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7195">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7196">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7196">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7197">otto cifre seguite da un carattere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7197">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7198">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7198">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7199">sette cifre seguite da un carattere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7199">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7200">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7200">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7201">Uno spazio o un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7201">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7202">una lettera di controllo (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7202">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7203">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7203">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7204">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7204">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7205">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7205">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7206">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7206">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7207">La funzione  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` o `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` trova il contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7207">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7208">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7208">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7209">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7209">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7210">La funzione  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` o `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` trova il contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7210">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7234">Spagna-numero di passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7234">Spain passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7235">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo nel tipo di informazioni riservate del numero di passaporto dell'Unione europea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7235">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7236">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7236">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7237">combinazione di otto o nove caratteri di lettere e numeri senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7237">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7238">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7238">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7239">combinazione di lettere e numeri di otto o nove caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7239">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7240">due cifre o lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7240">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7241">una cifra o una lettera (facoltativa)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7241">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7242">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7242">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7243">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7243">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7244">Non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7244">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7245">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7245">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7246">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7246">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7247">L'espressione regolare  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7247">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7248">Una parola chiave da  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` o `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` viene trovata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7248">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7274">Spagna-codice di previdenza sociale (SSN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7274">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7275">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è inclusa nel codice di previdenza sociale dell'Unione europea o nel tipo di informazioni riservate ID equivalente ed è disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate stand-alone.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7275">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7276">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7276">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7277">11-12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7277">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7278">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7278">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7279">11-12 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7279">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7280">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7280">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7281">una barra (facoltativa)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7281">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7282">da sette a otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7282">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7283">una barra (facoltativa)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7283">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7284">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7284">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7285">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7285">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7286">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7286">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7287">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7287">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7288">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7288">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7289">La funzione Func_spanish_social_security_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7289">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7290">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7290">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Spain SSN -->
<Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7291">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7291">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7292">Nessuno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7292">None</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7293">Spagna-codice fiscale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7293">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7294">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7294">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7295">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7295">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7296">criteri di conformità della comunicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7296">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7297">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7297">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7298">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7298">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7299">Sicurezza delle app di Microsoft Cloud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7299">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7300">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7300">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7301">sette o otto cifre e una o due lettere nel modello specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7301">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7302">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7302">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7303">Persone fisiche spagnole con carta d'identità nazionale spagnola:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7303">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7304">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7304">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7305">una lettera maiuscola (con distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7305">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7306">Spagnoli non residenti senza una carta d'identità nazionale spagnola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7306">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7307">una lettera maiuscola "L" (con distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7307">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7308">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7308">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7309">una lettera maiuscola (con distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7309">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7310">Spagnoli residenti di età inferiore ai 14 anni senza una carta d'identità nazionale spagnola:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7310">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7311">una lettera maiuscola "K" (con distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7311">one uppercase letter"K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7312">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7312">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7324">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7324">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7325">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7325">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7326">La funzione  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` o `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` trova il contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7326">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7327">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7327">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7328">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7328">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7329">La funzione  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` o `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` trova il contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7329">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
