## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7360">Stringa di connessione di SQL Server</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7360">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7361">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7361">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7362">Stringa "ID utente", "ID utente", "UID" o "UserId" seguito dai caratteri e dalle stringhe delineati nel modello seguente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7362">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7363">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7363">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7364">stringa "ID utente", "ID utente", "UID" o "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7364">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7365">qualsiasi combinazione tra 1-200 lettere, cifre, simboli, caratteri speciali o spazi in maiuscolo o minuscolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7365">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7366">la stringa "password" o "pwd", dove "pwd" non è preceduta da una lettera minuscola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7366">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" is not preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7367">segno di uguale (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7367">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7368">qualsiasi carattere che non sia un segno di dollaro ($), un simbolo di percentuale (%), un simbolo maggiore di (>), il simbolo (@), le virgolette ("), il punto e virgola (;), parentesi graffa sinistra ([) o parentesi quadra sinistra ({)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7368">any character that is not a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7369">qualsiasi combinazione di 7-128 caratteri che non sono un punto e virgola (;), barra (/) o virgolette (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7369">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7370">un punto e virgola (;) o virgolette (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7370">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7371">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7371">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7372">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7372">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7373">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7373">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7374">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7374">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7375">L'espressione regolare CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString trova contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7375">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7376">**Non** viene trovata una parola chiave da CEP_GlobalFilter.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7376">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter is **not** found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7377">L'espressione regolare CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder **non** trova il contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7377">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7378">L'espressione regolare CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **non** trova il contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7378">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7406">Svezia-numero della patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7406">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7410">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7410">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7411">dieci cifre contenenti un trattino:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7411">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7416">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7416">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7417">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7417">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7418">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7418">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7419">L'espressione regolare  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7419">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7420">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7420">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity> 
```

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7436">Svezia-ID nazionale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7436">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7437">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7437">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7438">dieci o 12 cifre e un delimitatore facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7438">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7439">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7439">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7440">dieci o 12 cifre e un delimitatore facoltativo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7440">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7441">due cifre (facoltativa)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7441">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7442">Sei cifre nel formato data AAMMGG</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7442">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7443">delimitatore di "-" o "+" (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7443">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7444">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7444">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7445">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7445">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7446">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7446">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7447">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7447">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7448">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7448">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7449">La funzione `Func_swedish_national_identifier` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7449">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7450">Viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7450">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7451">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7451">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7452">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7452">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7453">La funzione `Func_swedish_national_identifier` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7453">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7454">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7454">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7473">Svezia-numero del passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7473">Sweden passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7474">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è inclusa nel tipo di informazioni riservate del numero di passaporto dell'Unione europea ed è disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate stand-alone.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7474">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7475">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7475">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7476">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7476">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7477">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7477">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7478">otto cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7478">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7479">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7479">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7480">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7480">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7481">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7481">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7482">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7482">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7483">l'espressione regolare Regex_sweden_passport_number trova contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7483">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7484">si verifica una delle condizioni seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7484">one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7485">viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_passport.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7485">a keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7486">viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_sweden_passport.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7486">a keyword from Keyword_sweden_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
<Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7517">Svezia-codice di previdenza sociale o identificazione equivalente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7517">Sweden social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7518">Questa entità dei tipi di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo nel tipo di informazioni riservate del codice di previdenza sociale dell'Unione europea o ID equivalente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7518">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7519">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7519">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7520">12 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7520">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7521">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7521">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7522">12 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7522">12 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7523">otto cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (AAAAMMGG)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7523">eight digits that correspond to the birth date (YYYYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7524">tre cifre che corrispondono a un numero di serie in cui:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7524">three digits that correspond to a serial number where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7525">L'ultima cifra del numero di serie indica il sesso per l'assegnazione di un numero dispari per il maschio e per un numero pari per la femmina</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7525">the last digit in the serial number indicates gender by the assignment of an odd number for male and an even number for female</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7526">fino a 1990, l'assegnazione del numero di serie corrispondeva alla contea in cui è Nato il portatore del numero o (se è nato prima del 1947) dove viveva, secondo i registri delle tasse, il 1 ° gennaio 1947, con un codice speciale (solitamente 9 come settima cifra) per gli immigrati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7526">up to 1990, the assignment of serial number corresponded to the county where the bearer of the number was born or (if born before 1947) where he/she had been living, according to tax records, on January 1, 1947, with a special code (usually 9 as the 7th digit) for immigrants</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7527">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7527">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7528">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7528">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7529">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7529">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7530">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7530">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7531">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7531">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7532">La funzione  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7532">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7533">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7533">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7534">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7534">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7535">La funzione  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7535">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7551">Svezia-codice fiscale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7551">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7552">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7552">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7553">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7553">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7554">criteri di conformità della comunicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7554">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7555">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7555">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7556">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7556">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7557">Sicurezza delle app di Microsoft Cloud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7557">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7558">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7558">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7559">dieci cifre e un simbolo nel modello specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7559">ten digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7560">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7560">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7561">dieci cifre e un simbolo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7561">ten digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7562">sei cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (AAMMGG)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7562">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7563">un segno di addizione o segno meno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7563">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7564">tre cifre che rendono il numero di identificazione univoco dove:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7564">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7565">per i numeri emessi prima del 1990, la settima e la terza cifra identificano la Contea di nascita o gli stranieri nati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7565">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7566">la cifra nella nona posizione indica il sesso per il maschio o per la femmina.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7566">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7567">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7567">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7568">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7568">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7569">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7569">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7570">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7570">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7571">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7571">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7572">La funzione  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7572">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7573">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7573">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7574">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7574">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7575">La funzione  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7575">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7601">Codice SWIFT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7601">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7602">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7602">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7603">quattro lettere seguite da 5-31 lettere o cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7603">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7604">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7604">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7605">quattro lettere seguite da 5-31 lettere o cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7605">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7606">codice bancario di quattro lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7606">four-letter bank code (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7607">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7607">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7608">4-28 lettere o cifre (BBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7608">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7609">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7609">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7610">una o tre lettere o cifre (parte restante del BBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7610">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7611">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7611">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7612">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7612">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7613">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7613">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7614">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7614">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7615">L'espressione regolare Regex_swift restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7615">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7616">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_swift.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7616">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7650">Svizzera SSN numero dell'AVS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7650">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7651">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7651">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7652">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7652">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7653">criteri di conformità della comunicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7653">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7654">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7654">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7655">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7655">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7656">Sicurezza delle app di Microsoft Cloud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7656">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7657">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7657">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7658">numero di 13 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7658">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7659">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7659">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7660">numero 13 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7660">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7661">tre cifre-756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7661">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7662">un punto facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7662">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7663">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7663">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7664">un punto facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7664">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7665">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7665">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7666">un punto facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7666">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7667">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7667">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7668">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7668">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7669">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7669">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7670">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7670">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7671">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7671">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7672">La funzione Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7672">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7673">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7673">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7674">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7674">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7675">La funzione Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7675">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7696">Numero di identificazione nazionale di Taiwan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7696">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7697">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7697">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7698">una lettera (in lingua inglese) seguita da nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7698">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7699">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7699">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7700">una lettera (in lingua inglese) seguita da nove cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7700">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7701">una lettera (in inglese, senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7701">one letter (in English, not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7702">la cifra "1" o "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7702">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7703">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7703">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7704">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7704">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7705">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7705">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7706">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7706">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7707">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7707">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7708">La funzione Func_taiwanese_national_id restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7708">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7709">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_taiwanese_national_id.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7709">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7710">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7710">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7711">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7711">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7712">La funzione Func_taiwanese_national_id restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7712">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7713">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7713">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7730">Taiwan-numero di passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7730">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7731">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7731">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7732">numero di passaporto biometrico: nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7732">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7733">numero di passaporto non biometrico: nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7733">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7734">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7734">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7735">numero di passaporto biometrico:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7735">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7736">il carattere "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7736">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7737">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7737">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7738">numero di passaporto non biometrico:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7738">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7739">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7739">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7740">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7740">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7741">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7741">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7742">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7742">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7743">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7743">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7744">L'espressione regolare Regex_taiwan_passport trova contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7744">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7745">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_taiwan_passport.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7745">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml

<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7756">Numero di certificato residente taiwanese (ARC/TARC Tax)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7756">Taiwan resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7757">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7757">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7758">dieci lettere e cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7758">ten letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7759">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7759">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7760">dieci lettere e cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7760">ten letters and digits:</span></span>

```xml
  </Pattern>

```

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7782">Codice di identificazione della popolazione tailandese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7782">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7783">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7783">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7784">13 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7784">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7785">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7785">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7786">13 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7786">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7787">la prima cifra non è pari a zero o nove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7787">first digit is not zero  or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7788">12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7788">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7789">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7789">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7790">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7790">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7791">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7791">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7792">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7792">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7793">La funzione Func_Thai_Citizen_Id trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7793">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7794">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7794">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7795">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7795">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7796">La funzione Func_Thai_Citizen_Id trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7796">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7805">Numero di identificazione nazionale turco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7805">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7806">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7806">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7808">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7808">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7809">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7809">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7810">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7810">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7811">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7811">Yes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7813">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7813">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7816">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7816">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7817">La funzione Func_Turkish_National_Id trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7817">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7824">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7824">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7825">numero della patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7825">driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7826">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è inclusa nel tipo di informazioni riservate del conducente dell'Unione europea ed è disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate stand-alone.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7826">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7827">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7827">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7828">Combinazione di 18 lettere e numeri nel formato specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7828">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7829">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7829">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7830">18 lettere e cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7830">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7831">cinque lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole/minuscole) o la cifra "9" al posto di una lettera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7831">five letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7832">una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7832">one digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7833">cinque cifre nel formato data MMDDY per data di nascita (il settimo carattere viene incrementato di 50 se il driver è di tipo femminile, ovvero 51 a 62 invece di 01 a 12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7833">five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth (7th character is incremented by 50 if driver is female, i.e. 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7834">due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole/minuscole) o la cifra "9" al posto di una lettera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7834">two letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7835">cinque cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7835">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7836">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7836">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7837">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7837">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7838">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7838">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7839">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7839">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7840">La funzione Func_uk_drivers_license restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7840">The function Func_uk_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7841">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_uk_drivers_license.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7841">A keyword from Keyword_uk_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7842">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7842">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7868">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7868">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7869">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7869">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7870">L'espressione regolare Regex_uk_electoral restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7870">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7871">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_uk_electoral.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7871">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7878">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7878">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7879">numero del servizio sanitario nazionale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7879">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7880">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7880">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7881">10-17 cifre separate da spazi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7881">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7882">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7882">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7883">10-17 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7883">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7884">tre o dieci cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7884">either three or ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7885">uno spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7885">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7886">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7886">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7887">uno spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7887">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7888">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7888">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7889">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7889">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7890">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7890">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7891">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7891">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7892">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7892">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7893">La funzione Func_uk_nhs_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7893">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7894">Si verifica una delle situazioni seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7894">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7895">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_uk_nhs_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7895">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7896">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_uk_nhs_number1.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7896">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7897">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7897">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7898">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7898">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7916">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7916">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7917">numero di assicurazione nazionale (NINO)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7917">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7918">Questa entità di tipo di informazioni riservate è inclusa nel tipo di informazioni riservate del numero di Identificaiton nazionale dell'Unione europea ed è disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate stand-alone.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7918">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identificaiton Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7919">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7919">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7920">sette caratteri o nove caratteri separati da spazi o trattini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7920">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7921">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7921">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7922">due modelli possibili:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7922">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7923">due lettere (NINOs valido utilizza solo alcuni caratteri in questo prefisso, che questo modello convalida; senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7923">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7924">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7924">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7925">' A ',' B ',' c'o ' d'(come il prefisso, solo alcuni caratteri sono consentiti nel suffisso, senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7925">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7926">OPPURE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7926">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7927">due lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7927">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7928">uno spazio o un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7928">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7929">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7929">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7930">uno spazio o un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7930">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7931">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7931">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7932">uno spazio o un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7932">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7933">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7933">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7934">uno spazio o un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7934">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7935">' A ',' B ',' c'o ' d'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7935">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7936">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7936">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7937">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7937">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7938">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7938">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7939">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7939">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7940">La funzione Func_uk_nino restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7940">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7941">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_uk_nino.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7941">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7942">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7942">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7943">La funzione Func_uk_nino restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7943">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7944">Non vengono trovate parole chiave da Keyword_uk_nino.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7944">No keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NINO -->
<Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7966">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7966">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7967">Numero di riferimento del contribuente univoco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7967">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7968">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7968">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7969">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7969">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7970">criteri di conformità della comunicazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7970">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7971">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7971">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7972">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7972">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7973">Sicurezza delle app di Microsoft Cloud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7973">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7974">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7974">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7975">10 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7975">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7976">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7976">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7977">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7977">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7978">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7978">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7979">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7979">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-7980">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7980">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-7981">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7981">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7982">La funzione  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7982">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-7983">Viene trovata una parola chiave from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-7983">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-8003">Numero di conto corrente bancario degli Stati Uniti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8003">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-8004">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8004">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-8005">8-17 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8005">8-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-8006">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8006">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-8007">8-17 cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8007">8-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-8008">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8008">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-8009">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8009">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-8010">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8010">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-8011">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8011">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-8012">L'espressione regolare Regex_usa_bank_account_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8012">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-8013">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_usa_Bank_Account.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8013">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-8043">Numero della patente di guida statunitense</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8043">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-8044">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8044">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-8045">Varia in base allo stato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8045">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-8046">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8046">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-8047">dipende dallo stato, ad esempio New York:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8047">depends on the state -- for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-8048">nove cifre formattate come ddd ddd ddd corrisponderanno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8048">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-8049">nove cifre come ddddddddd non corrispondono.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8049">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-8050">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8050">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-8051">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8051">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-8052">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8052">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-8053">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8053">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-8054">La funzione Func_new_york_drivers_license_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8054">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-8055">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8055">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-8056">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_us_drivers_license.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8056">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-8057">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 65%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8057">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-8058">La funzione Func_new_york_drivers_license_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8058">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-8059">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8059">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-8060">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8060">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-8061">Non vengono trovate parole chiave da Keyword_us_drivers_license.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8061">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
