## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-8159">Numero di identificazione individuale del contribuente statunitense (it)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8159">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-8160">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8160">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-8161">nove cifre che iniziano con un "9" e contengono "7" o "8" come quarta cifra, formattata facoltativamente con spazi o trattini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8161">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-8162">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8162">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-8163">formattato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8163">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-8164">la cifra "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8164">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-8165">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8165">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-8166">uno spazio o un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8166">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-8167">a "7" o "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8167">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-8168">una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8168">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-8169">uno spazio o un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8169">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-8170">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8170">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-8171">formattato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8171">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-8172">la cifra "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8172">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-8173">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8173">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-8174">a "7" o "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8174">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-8175">cinque cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8175">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-8176">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8176">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-8177">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8177">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-8178">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8178">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-8179">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8179">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-8180">La funzione Func_formatted_itin restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8180">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-8181">Si verifica almeno una delle situazioni seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8181">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0017b-8182">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_itin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8182">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0017b-8183">La funzione Func_us_address rileva un indirizzo nel formato di data corretto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8183">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0017b-8184">La funzione Func_us_date rileva una data nel formato corretto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8184">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0017b-8185">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_itin_collaborative.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8185">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-8186">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 75%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8186">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-8187">La funzione Func_unformatted_itin restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8187">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-8188">Si verifica almeno una delle situazioni seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8188">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0017b-8189">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_itin_collaborative.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8189">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0017b-8190">La funzione Func_us_address rileva un indirizzo nel formato di data corretto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8190">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="0017b-8191">La funzione Func_us_date rileva una data nel formato corretto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8191">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
<Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-8212">Codice di previdenza sociale degli Stati Uniti (SSN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8212">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-8213">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8213">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-8214">nove cifre, che possono trovarsi in un modello formattato o non formattato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8214">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="0017b-8215">Se emesso prima della metà del 2011, un SSN ha una formattazione complessa in cui alcune parti del numero devono rientrare in alcuni intervalli per essere valide (ma non c'è nessun checksum).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8215">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-8216">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8216">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-8217">quattro funzioni cercano SNSS in quattro modelli diversi:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8217">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-8218">Func_ssn trova SNSS con una formattazione complessa pre2011 formattata con trattini o spazi (ddd-dd-dddd o ddd dd dddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8218">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-8219">Func_unformatted_ssn trova SNSS con una formattazione complessa pre2011 che non è formattata come nove cifre consecutive (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8219">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-8220">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn trova post-2011 SNSS formattati con trattini o spazi (ddd-dd-dddd o ddd dd dddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8220">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-8221">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn trova post-2011 SNSS che non sono formattati come nove cifre consecutive (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8221">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-8222">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8222">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-8223">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8223">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="0017b-8224">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8224">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0017b-8225">Un criterio DLP rileva questo tipo di informazioni con una probabilità del 85%, entro 300 caratteri, se:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8225">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-8226">La funzione Func_ssn restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8226">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="0017b-8227">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_ssn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0017b-8227">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>
